availability.p: Available with prior consent of the CELT programme for purposes of academic research and teaching only.

Copyright for the printed edition rests with the School of Celtic Studies, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies, Dublin. The electronic edition was compiled with the kind permission of the copyright owner.

listBibl.head: The edition used in the digital edition

titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála
titleStmt.editor: R. I. Best and M. A. O'Brien

samplingDecl.p: The present text represents pages 1119–1192 and 1202–1325 of the volume. Esnada Tige Buchat and Fingal Rónáin are available in separate files and are omitted here. The editorial introduction, notes and indexes have also been omitted. Missing text supplied by the editors is tagged sup. Expansions to the text are marked ex.

correction.p: Text has been checked and proofread once. All corrections and supplied text are tagged.

normalization.p: The electronic text represents the edited text.

segmentation.p: div0=the whole document; div1=the section; stanzas are marked lg.

interpretation.p: Names of persons (given names), and places are not tagged. Terms for cultural and social roles are not tagged.

profileDesc.creation: By Irish scribes in monastic scriptoria, based on older materials. 1150–1190

langUsage.language: The text is in Middle Irish.

change.item: Corrections to encoding (Irish ampersand) made as suggested by Liz Gabay.
Minor changes to file header; file reparsed and converted to SGML.
File proofed (1); markup adapted; more structural and content markup applied to file, header inserted from companion file.
File captured, basic xml markup applied, file proofed (2).

div1.head: Do fallsigud Tána Bó Cual&ndot;ge.
div1.p:
COncomgarthá trá filid Herend do &Sdot;enchán Torpeist. dús in
ba mebor leo Táin Bó Cualngi inna ógi. & asbertatar nad fetar di acht bloga nammá Asbert iarum Senchán ria daltu dús cia díb no ragad ara bennacht i tíre Letha do &fdot;oglaim na Tana berta in suí sair dar éis in chulmeinn. Dolluid Emine hua Ninene &ersir; Murgen mac Sencháin do thecht sair. iss ed dollotar do
&fdot;ertai &Fdot;ergusa. meic Róig &ersir; sech a liic oc Énloch la Connachta. Suidid Murgein a oenur oc liic &Fdot;ergusa. & luid cách úad do chungid taige oiged dóib colléic. Gabais Murgen tra laíd don lííc amal bid Fergus fessin adgladad a n-asbert riss iarum. Manib do liic luaich- thech malgel ma Róig rofessin fechtaib co n-éicsib imman
immanachta laithiu bruidin bé Cuail&ndot;gi in cech &fdot;ollus a &Fdot;ergus. La sodain forrubai in ceó mór imbi connach fúair a muntir co cend tri laa &ersir; tri n-aidche. & dolluid a dochum iarum. intí Fergus. fo chongraimimm chain .i. brat uanide léine chulpaitech co nderggintliud. claideb órduirn. maelassai chredumai. folt dond fair.
Adfét Fergus dó iarum in Táin uili amal dori&ndot;gned o thossuch co dead., Asberat alaili i&mmacr; is do &Sdot;enchan adchoas iar troscud fri noebu síl &Fdot;ergusa. &ersir; nibo machthad cid samlaid no beth. Tiagait uli co Senchan iarum &ersir; adfiadat a n-imthechta dó &ersir; ba buidechside díib
iarum dano. Is héseo turem remscéla Tána Bó Cualngi .i. a dó déc .i. De Gabáil in t⋅íd. De Aslingi in Meic Óic. De chophur na da Muccida. De Tháin Bó Regamain. De Echtra Nerai. De Chompirt Choncho- buir. De Thochmurc Ferbae De Chompirt Con Culaind. De Thain Bó
Flidais. De Thochmurc Emiri. Atberat dano is di remscelaib. De Thecht Con Culaind do thaig Culaind cherdda. De Gabail gascid do Choin Chulaind. & dia dul i carpat. Dia luid Cú Chulaind do Emain Macha cosna maccu. Acht is i curp na Tána adfiadtar na tri sceóil dedenchasa.,

div1.head: De Gabail in t&Sdot;ida in so sic.,
div1.p:
BOí rí amra for Tuathaib Dea i nHere. Dagan a ainm. Ba mór dī a chumachta. ced la Maccu Miled iar &ndot;gabail in tíre. ar collset Tuatha Dea ith &ersir; blicht im Maccu Miled. co ndingsat chairddes in Dagdai. Doessartsaide iarum ith &ersir; blicht
dóib. Ba mór dī a chumachtasom in tan ba rí i tossuch. &ersir; ba hé
fodail inna side do &fdot;eraib Dea .i. Lug mac Ethnend i sSíd Rodrubán. Ogma i sSíd Aircheltrai. Don Dagdu fessin i&mmacr; Síth Leithet Lachtmaige oí asíd Cnocc Báine. Brú Ruair. Síd in Broga dano ba laiss i tossuch. amal asberat. Do lluid dī in Mac
Oac cosin Dagda. do chungid &fdot;eraind o forodail do chách. ba daltasaide dī do Midir Breg Léith. &ersir; do Nindid &fdot;áith. nimthá duit ol in Dagda. Ni tharnaic fodail lemm. Etá dam dī ol in Mac Ooc. Cid bia co n-aidchi it trib féin. dobreth dosom ón iarum. Collá dot daim tra ol in Dagda uaire doromailt do ré Is menand
olse. is laa &ersir; adaig in bith uile. &ersir; iss ed on doratad damsa. Luid dó Dagán ass iarum &ersir; anaid in Macc Oóc ina ⋅íd. Amra dano a tír hisin. Ataat tri chrand co torud and do grés. &ersir; mucc bithbeo fo chossaib &ersir; mucc &fdot;onaithe. &ersir; lestar co llind ⋅ainemail. &ersir; ni erchranand sin uile do grés.,

div1.head: De Chophur in da Muccida
div1.p:
CeiSt cid dia tá Cophur na Muccide. Ni handsa. .i. muccaid Ochaill Oichni. &ersir; muccaid Boidb rig síde Muman. alaile rí síde Connacht. Síd &mdot;Boidb iss ed Síd ar Femun. Sid nOchaill iss ed Síd Cruachan. Ro boí dī cairddes eter ríg síde
Muman. &ersir; ríg side Connacht. Ro batar dano da muccaid ocaib .i. Friuch &ersir; Rucht a n-anmand .i. Friuch muccaid Boidb. Rucht muccaid Ochaill. Ro boí dano carddess eturrusaide .i. suithe ngentlechta la cechtar de. &ersir; nos delbtais in cech richt. amal no bíth Mo&ndot;gán mac Fiachna.
Ba he carddes na da muccaidse .i. In tan ba mess la Mumnechu. Do theiged in muccaid atúaid cona muccaib caelaib fadess. In tan ba mess dano atúaid. no theiged in muccaid andess fathúaith. Consoíter debuid eturru. Asbertis Connachta ba mó cumachta a mmuccida. Asbertis Mumnig dano ba mó cumachta a mmuccida.
Bliadain and dano mess mór la Mumnechu & dolluid in muccaid atúaid fadess cona muccaib leis. Feraid a cheile failte ris. Consaíter etrunni mad tú ol se. Asberat ind &fdot;irseo is mó do chumachtasu indausa. Ni lugu ém ol muccaid Ochaill. Bieid ní i fessamar ón ol muccaid Boidb. Dogensa urgaire do muccsu connápat metha
ce beit for mess. &ersir; bat metha mo mucca féin. Ocus immarránic anísin iarum. Téit muccaid Ochaill dia thaig iarum cona muccaib caelaib leis. iss infechtain rosiachtatar less ar throgi. Con- tibther immiseom o ránic a thír. Olc húar lodsai ol cach fris. Is mó cumachta do cheili andaí Ni bá anísin ol sesseom. Biaid mess
lenni atherruch &ersir; dogensa in cless cetna risseom. &ersir; immarranic son dano iarum. Téit muccaid Boidb fathúaid a dochumsom día bliadna cona muccaib caelaib leiss i tíre Connacht. & dogeni muccaid Ochaill a cetna fria muccasom coro ⋅erggsat. Co n-erbairt cách ba cumma a cumachtu dib linaib. Luid muccaid Boidb
atúaid cona muccaib caelaib leiss. Gataid Bodb a muccaidecht n-airi. Gatar dano a muccaidecht arin fer atúaith. Dí bliadain lána dóib iar sin i ndelbaib senén.

Indala bliadain túaid la Connachta for Dún Chruachan in bliadain aile dóib oc Síd ar &Fdot;emun. Condrancatar fir Muman i n-oendáil
laa n-óen and. Ní bec a ndeilm dogniat ind eoin arfar &mdot;belaib. ol eat. bliadain lán o tát ocond imchiradsa &ersir; ocund ábairtse cosindiu. Tan iarum batar forsna briathraibse co n-accatar rechtaire Ochaill chuccu issin telaig. Fuidell mac Fiadmire a ainmside. ferthair failte friss. Is mór a ndeilm dogniat ind eóin arbar &mdot;belaib.
Indar lat batir hé da én batar ocund atuaith innuraid. & iss ed dano dogníside co cend &mdot;bliadna a cetna. Co n-accat ní iar suidiu batar delba doíne. in da ⋅inén hísin. Ataciat iar suidiu batir é a ndá muccid. Ferait failti friu. Ni fíu falti frinn or muccaid Boidb biaid mór colla cóem. &ersir; mór núall diar n-ág ar
&ndot;dís. Cichib róer ol Bodb. Nin foruireth na mmaith ol se. O lodmarni uaibse ol se dib línaib dí blíadain lána cossindiu. Ataam i ndelbaib én. Adchondarcfarsi a ndori&ndot;gensamni arbar &mdot;belaib. Bliadain lán dún i Cruachnaib ocund urdsin. Bliadain aile oc Sid ar Femun. Co n-&fdot;accatar ind &fdot;ir atúaid &ersir; indess ar cumachta
díb línaib. Regmai dano ifechtsa i ndelba míl uisci &ersir; bemmit fo murib co cend dá bliadna aile. Documlat uadib iar sin cechtar n-aí a leth. Luid indala n-aí i Sinnaind luid alaile i sSiúir. Batir iar sin da bliadain lana fon uisci. Bliadain lán atchitís i sSiúir ic immithi. In bliadain aile dano atchitis i sSinaind. Batar dano
da n-oss. &ersir; teclamad cechtar n-aí osséti co ndenad damlīg do mennut a cheile. Batir da &fdot;ennid &ersir; imgonad cechtar de a chéle. Batir da ⋅iabuir &ersir; fobuthad cechtar de a chéile. Batir da draic túarcad cechtar de snechta for tír a cheili. Dofuittet díb línaib assind aér comtar di dorbbi. Teit indala n-aí i topur Glaisse Cruind
i Cual&ndot;giu. conda essib bó Dáiri meic Fiachnai. & teit alaile i n-Uarán &ndot;Garad la Connachta conda ib bó Medba &ersir; Ailella conid díb ro chinset in da tharb. in Finnbennach Aí &ersir; in Dub Cual&ndot;gi. Rúcht &ersir; Runce. imtar dá muccid. I&ndot;gen &ersir; Eitte imdar da ⋅inén. Bled &ersir; Blod imtar da míl fo murib. Rind &ersir; Faebur imtar da
&fdot;énnid. Scáth &ersir; Scíath imtar dí ⋅iabair. Crunniuc &ersir; Tuinniuc imdar dí dorbbai. Finnbend Aí &ersir; in Dond Cual&ndot;gi a n-anmand in tan batar da tharb.

Is amlaid baí in Dond Cualngi
dubdond diumsach discir dondócach.
fuascrach. forbartach. forranach. illanach.
tnuthach tairbech taeb⋅lemun.
calma comnart. cliabremur.
cendard cassetnach.
crónanach cran⋅úilech. mo&ndot;gach munremur. munelach
súlmar srónmar sétfethach.
co tul tarbda.
co tachim thuinni.
co tarbigi ríg. co ruathur bethrach.
co mbruth biasta.
co mbuilli latraind.
co lunni leomain.
co taillsitis tricha mac midaísi o médi co midáid.
Midach na mocháirgi.
Ónmit na himmirgi.
maccóem na n-innili.
tamon na trebairi. Athair na mórchethra.
mó dindgna dam domun. Dond.
Findbennach i&mmacr;
damsaide cen&fdot;ind cossind,
croda crochda. croderg mar do rotte roth.
mar do fothraicthe fuil.
mar do commiltea i corcair.
co ndeil diliucht
o dela co droind. tri moi&ndot;g maithchrúi.
maccaím búair nAí
gu n-urbull imthromm.
co n-ucht echda.
co n-ubullrosc ercce.

Con-erthossach écne
co n-íargaile erre.
co n-adabraib baisi.
buadgein buagnige.
buridach nolairain. dretel damraide
diabul feibe Finnbennach. Findbennach

div1.head: Tain Bó Flidaisi.
div1.p:
BOI Flidais ben Ailella Find i crích Ciarraige. Carais Fergus
mac Rooig ara airscelaib. &ersir; dothegtis techta úadi cind cecha sechtmaine béus a dochum. A ndolluid iarum dochum Connacht. dobertsom ri Ailill anísein. Cid digén di sund ol Fergus arna raib meth n-einich na anma duit and. Cid dogenam de dī ol Ailill. Imraidfemni &ersir; Medb nech úainn co Ailill Find do
chobair dúnni. &ersir; uaire is co dul neich dó ni fail nap tussu fadéin nod tét. bid ferr de ind ascaid. Dothét Fergus ass la sodain a tríchait láech. In da &Fdot;ergus &ersir; Dubthach. co mbatar oc Áth Fénnai i tuasciurt. críchi Ciarraigi. Tiagait don dún. ferthair failte friu. Cid fris tudchabair ol Ailill
Find. Coro anam celide latsu ol &Fdot;ergus. dáig ata debaid dúnn ri Ailill mac Matach. Ni anfasu limsa ém ol Ailill Find. Mad nech i&mmacr; dot muntir no ainfed. Dáig adfiastar damsa not chara mo ben. Etair ascaid di chethra dī dúnn. Atá eicen mór forn. Ni bérasu ascaid uaimse ol Ailill dia n-ana chelide lemm. Doberar
dam co tinniu dóib cona dú di chormaim dia feiss. Ni chathiubsa do biadsu ám ol Fergus uaire na biur th' ascaid. Assind liuss duit dī ol Ailill. Rotbía són ol Fergus. ni gebthar forbasi fort. Doscumlat ass iarum. Tairceth fer i n-áth ol Fergus fó chetóir i ndorus ind liss. Ni éraibther &ersir; ni erbbaibther dom
inchaibse ém ol Ailill. ragatsa féin ol se. Cia úann ragas ara chind ind &fdot;ir a Dubthaig ol Fergus. Ragatsa ara chind cid me ol Dubthach Dothét Dubthach iarum issin n-áth ara chind. Benaid Dubthach sleig tríit co ndechaid tria di ⋅liasait. Dolleciseom dano gai do Dubthach co mbert crand tríít.
Tuthaet Fergus mac Oenlama fessin. La sodain benaid Ailill sleig triit co torchair ina ligi. Totháet Flidais la sodain assin dún. Ataig a bratt tairsiu a triur. Maidti munter &Fdot;ergusa hi teiched. maidti Ailill ina ndiaid. Facabair fiche laech leis gun airliuch. Atluí ochtur dia muntir din trichait connici Cruachain. Adfiadat a
scél. Cotéraig Ailill &ersir; Medb co mathib Connacht. &ersir; lo&ndot;gas Ulad archena do ascnam hi crich Ciarraige cona mbuidnib. condici

Áth Fenna. &ersir; dobretha colléic ind óic athgoíti la Flidais issin dún. Congairther Ailill Find assin dún do Ailill &ersir; Meidb. Ni regsa ol se is mór a ⋅otla &ersir; a olcas ind &fdot;ir fil and ol se. Dobretha ind óic for
fúataib úad anall. Co mbatar i ndunad la Ailill mac Máta. Sechtmain lán eter dá áige dóib oc togail in dúine fén. Co torchratar secht fichit láech do mathib Connacht. Nibbo do ⋅éun maith dodechabair úan a &Fdot;ergus ol Ailill. Ni gó ém ci asberthar són ol Bricriu cen nech do thutim lind. Ba ágae
immaric cech fer dib. nadcon torchair cid oen&fdot;er la cech n-ae. It móra na tri corthese do bith fo chonaib &ersir; énaib. La sodain coteirget a triur lomnachta. &ersir; bert imdorus ind liss remib co mbuí i mmedón. & tiagait Connachta leu immalle issin less. & arslegait secht cét láech issin dún. Im Ailill Find &ersir; im trichait mac dia maccaib. &ersir; im
Amalgaid Múad. &ersir; imm Eochaich Muinmedain. &ersir; im Chorpre Cromm. &ersir; im Ailill m Brefni. &ersir; im thri Oengusa Bodbgnai. &ersir; im thrí Echdachu Irruis. &ersir; im secht &mdot;Breslenu Aí &ersir; im choicait &ndot;Domnall. & doberat Flidais assin dún. &ersir; dobreth a mbaí di chethrai and .i. cét lulgach &ersir;uii. fichit dam. &ersir; tricha cét di chethrai
olchena. Is iar sin luid Flidais co Fergus mac Róig. & is do⋅ein no gaibed Flidais cech sechtmad laa do &fdot;eraib Herend dia toiscid ocon Táin. & is desin luid la Fergus iar Táin dochum a chríchi. co ngab rige nUlad. & iss and atbathsi iarum oc Tráig Baili. Is di⋅ein atá Tain
Bó Flidais i rremscelaib na Tána.,

div1.head: Tain Bó Fraich.
div1.p:
FRóech mac Idaith do Chonnachtaib. Macside do Bé Find a sídib. Derbsiursaide do Boind. Is hé laech is áildem ro buí do &fdot;eraib Herend &ersir; Alban. Acht níba suthain. Dobert a
mathair dí bae déc dó assin t⋅id. It é finda óiderga. Boí trebad maith oca co cend ocht &mdot;bliadan cen tabairt mna chuca. Coíca mac ríg rop é lín a teglaich. comaís comchutrumma fris uile eter chruth &ersir; chosc. Carthai Findabair ingen Ailella &ersir; Medba ara irscélaib. Adfiadar
dosom oca thaig. Ropu lán Heriu &ersir; Albu. dia allud &ersir; dia scélaib. Iar suidiu docorastar fair dul do acallaim na hingine. Immaroraid fria muntir anísin. Tiagar uait dī co siair do mathar co tucthar ni do étuch i&ndot;gantach &ersir; de ascedaib síde duit uadi. Luid iarum co &fdot;iair .i. co Bóind co mbuí i mMaig Breg. & dobert
coicait &mdot;bratt &ndot;gorm &ersir; ba cosmail cech ae ri findruine &ndot;doíle. &ersir; cetheora oa dubglassa for cech brutt. & mílech derggóir la cech &mdot;bratt. & lenti bángela co tuagmílaib óir impu. & coíca scíath n-argdide co n-imlib. & caindel rígthigi i lláim cech ae & coíca sem- mand findruine ar cech n-ae. Coíca toracht di ór forloiscthi in
cech n-ae. Eirmitiuda di charrmocul foib anís. & is di lecaib log- mairib a n-airíarn. No l.astais i n-aidche amal betis ruithni gréni. & coica claideb n-órduirn leo. & gabor bocglas fó ⋅uidi cech &fdot;ir. &ersir; beilge óir friu. Maelland arggait co cluciniu óir fo bragit cech eich. Coíca acrann corcra co snathib argait estib. co siblaib óir &ersir; argait
&ersir; co cendmilaib. Coíca echlasc findruine co mbaccán órda for cinn cech ae. amp.uii. milchoin i slabradaib argait. &ersir; ubull n-óir eter cech n-ae. Broca credumai impu. Noco rabi dath nad beth intib. Morfesser cornaire leo co cornaib órdaib &ersir; argdidib. co n-etaigib ildathachaib. co mo&ndot;gaib órdáib sidbudib. co lennaib etractaib.
Bátir tri drúith remib co mindaib argdidib fo diór. Sceith co fethul chonduala la cech n-ae co círbachlaib co n-esnadaib credumai iarna toebaib. Triar cruittire co n-écosc ríg im cech n-ae. Documlát ass do Chruachnaib cossind ecuscsin leu. Dos&ndot;déccai in
derccaid din dún. in tan dodechatar i mMag Cruachan. Dirimm
atchiusa ol se don dún inna lín ó gabais Ailill &ersir; Medb flaith nicos tánic riam &ersir; nicos ticfa dírimm bas choímiu. na bess áiniu. Is cumma lemm bed i taulchubu &fdot;ína no beth mo chend lasin gáeth dothaet tairsiu. Abras &ersir; abairt dogní in t-ócláech fil and. nochon accasa riam a chutrumma. Focheird a bunsaig rout n-aurchora úad. siu
cotrí ri talmain nos gaibet na .uii. milchoin cona secht slabradaib argdidib. La sodain dothiagat in t⋅lúaig. a dún Chruachan dia ndécsin immusmúchat in doíni issin dún co n-apthatar sé fir déc oco ndeicsin. Tairle&ndot;gait i ndorus in dúine. Scoirit a n-eochu. &ersir; lécit a mílchona.
Dosennat na.uii. n-aige do Ráith Chruachan. &ersir; secht sinnchu &ersir; uii. mila maige. &ersir; uii. turcu alta. conda rubatar ind óic issind aur- laind in dúine. Iar sain focherdat in milchoin bedg. i mBréi. gabait .uii. &ndot;doborchona. Dosbertatar dochum na ardda. i ndorus na prímrátha.
Deissiter i ssuidiu. Dotíagar ond ríg dia n-acallaim. Imchomarcar cia bu chan dóib. Noda sloindet iarum iarna slontib fíraib. Fróech mac Idaith in so ol seat. Ráite in rechtaire frisin ríg &ersir; in rígnai. Fo chen dóib ol Ailill &ersir; Medb. Is óclách án fil and ol Ailill. Táet issin less. Dolleicther dóib cethramthu in taige.
Ed a écosc in taige. Sechtordd and. Secht n-imdai o thein co fraig isin taig imme cuaird. Airinech di chredumu for cech imdái. Aurscartad derggibair fo mrechtruncain uile. Trí stéill chredumai i n-aulaith cecha imda. Secht stialla umai on damdabaich co cleithe issin tig. De gíus dogníth a tech. Ba tuga slinned boí fair
dianechtair. Batar sé senistri déc issin tig. & comlae humae ar cech n-aí Cumg umai darsa forlés. Cetheor ochtga humai for imdái Ailella &ersir; Medba. immdernide de chredumu uili. is sí i certmedón in taige Da aurainech arggait impe for diór. Flesc argait isind airin- niuch rosaiged midlissiu in taige. Timchellad a tech imme cuaird.
ón dorus dialailiu. Arrócbat a &ndot;gaisceda issin taigsin & sedait. &ersir; ferthair failte riu. Fochen dúib ol Ailill &ersir; Medb. Iss ed doróachtamar ol Froech. niba durais ar aig baig ón ol Medb. Imbrid Medb &ersir; Ailill fidchell iar sin. gaibid Froech iarum imbeirt fidchille ri fer dia muntir. ba
caínide &fdot;idchella. Clár findruine and co cetheoraib auaib &ersir; uilneib óir. Caindel de líc logmair oc fursunnud dóib. Or &ersir; arggat ind &fdot;uirend boí forsin chlar. Aurgnaid biad donaib ocaib ol Ailill. Ni hed is accobor limm ol Medb. Acht dul do imbirt na fidchille thall

fri Fróech. Eirgg dó. is maith limsa ol Ailill. Imberat in fidchill
iarum &ersir; Fróech. Boí a muinter colléic oc fuiniu na fiadmíl. Sennat do chruitteri dún ol Ailill ri Fráech. Sennat ém ol Fráech. Crottbolg di chrocnib doborchon impu. cona n-imdenam do phartai&ndot;g. foa n-imdenam di ór &ersir; arggat. bíann n-erbbad impu a mmedón. ba gilidir snecta.
Sella dubglassa inna mmedonaide. Bruit lín gilidir fuan &ndot;gessa imna tetasin. Imreithitís na delbasin iarum inna firu immecuaird. Sennait dóib iarum. conid apthatar da &fdot;er déc dia muntir la coí &ersir; torsi. Ba caín &ersir; ba bind in triarsa. &ersir; batar caíni úaitni in sein. Is hé in
triar irdaircc. Tri derbrathir .i. Goltraiges &ersir; Gentraiges &ersir; Suantraiges. Boind a ssidib a mmathair a triur. Is din cheol sephainn Úaithne cruitt in Dagdai ainmnigther a triur. In tan bóe in ben oc lamnad. ba gol mairgg lee la gúri na n-idan i tossuch ba gen &ersir; fáilte ar bíth ar medón ar imtholtain in da mac. Ba súan algine arabeitte in
mac dedenach ar thrumme inna brithe. Conid de ro ainmniged trian in chiúil. dofiussig iarum assin t⋅úan in Boind. Aur&fdot;oímsiu ol si do thrí maccu a Uathni lanbrotha fo bith file Suantride &ersir; Gentride &ersir; Goltride ar búaib sceo mnaib dothoetsat la Meidb &ersir; Ailill. Atbelat fir la clúaiss &ndot;gléssa dóib.
Anait din t⋅enmaim iar sain issind rígthaig is ségond dofanic ol Fergus. Fodlid dún ol Fróech fria muntir a mbiad. Tucaid isa tech. Doci&ndot;g Lothur for lár in taige fodáile doib a mbiad fora dernaind no rannad cech n-ágae cona chlaindiub &ersir; ni aidleth toinn na feóil. O gabais rannairecht ni archíuir bíad foa láim
riam. Batar tri laa &ersir; teora aidche oc imbirt na fidchille. La immed na lliac logmar i tegluch &Fdot;roích. Iar sin adgladar Fróech Meidb Is maith ro ngabus fritt ol se. Ní biur do thochaill dind &fdot;ithchill. Ná raib meth n-einich deit and. O túsa issin dúnsa iss ed laithe inso
a siam limm ol Medb. Deithbir ón ol Fraech atáat tri laa. &ersir; teora aidchi and. La sodain atraig Medb. ba mmebul lée buith donaib ócaib cen bíad. Luid co Ailill. ráidti friss. Mór gním doringensam ol sí ind óic annechtair donnáncatar do bith cen bíad. Diliu duit imbeirt
fidchille ol Ailill. Ni derban in fodail dia muntirseom sethnu in taige. Atát tri laa &ersir; teora aidchi and ol sisi. Acht nadá n-airigmer in n-aidchi la bán⋅uilsi ind líac logmar issin tig. Apraid riu ol Ailill anat dina cuínib co fodailter dóib. fodailter dóib íarum. &ersir; ba

maith ro mboth friu. &ersir; ansait tri laa &ersir; teora aidchi and iar sin
forsind &fdot;ledugud. Is iarum conaccrad Fróech issa tech immacall- amae &ersir; imchoímras dó cid dodnucai. Is maith ol se limm célide libsi. Ni holc ém lassa teglach for &ndot;gnás ol Ailill. is ferr for tormach oldás for digbáil. Anfimni dī ol Fraech nach sechtmain. Anait iar sin co cend coicthigis issin dún. & toffund dóib cech óenlá dochum in
dúine. Dosaigtis Connachta dia ndécsin. Ba imned la Fraech cen acallaim na ingine. Sech ba hé less nod &mdot;bert. Laithe n-and atraig deud aidche do inlut dond abaind.
Is hé tan dolluidsi ón. &ersir; a hinailt do indlut. Gaibidsom a lláimsi. An rim acallaim ol se. Is tú doroachtamar. Is fochen limsa ém ol
ind ingen ma chotíssind. Ni chumgaimm ní duit., Ceist in n-éláfa limm ol se. Ní élub ém ol si ór issam ingen rig &ersir; rígna. Ni &fdot;il dot daidbrisiu. nachimm étasa om muntir. &ersir; bid hé mo thogasa dano dul chucutsu. is tu ro charus. & beirsiu lat in dornaiscse ol ind ingen. &ersir; bíd etrond do chomarthu. Dosrat mo mathair damsa ol si
dia taiscid. &ersir; asbér is cor rodalláus immudu. Téit dano cechtar de a leth iar sain. Attagursa ol Ailill élud inna hingine ucut la Fróech. ce dobertha dó nipad madae. &ersir; dotaísed ar &ndot;dochum cona chethrai do chobair dún ocon Táin. Dotháet Froech cuccu issa tech n-immacaldmae. In cocur fil lib ol Fráech. Dotallfasu
indi ol Ailill. In tiberaid damsa for n-ingin ol Fráech. immanaiccet in t⋅lúaig doberthar ol Ailill. dia tuca tinnscra amal asbérthar. Rotbia ol Fráech Tri fichit ech &ndot;dubglass damsa ol Ailill cona mbeilgib óir friu. &ersir; di laulgaich deec o mmeltar ól n-aiss ó cech ae. &ersir; láeg find óiderg la cech n-áe. & tuidecht duit limm cot lín uile &ersir;
cot áes chíuil do thabair inna mbó a Cuail&ndot;giu. & doberthar mo ingensa duit acht co tís. Dotho&ndot;gusa tarmo sciath. &ersir; tarmo chlaideb. &ersir; darm threlam ni thibrind i tindscra cid Meidbi insin. Dochi&ndot;g uadaib asa taig iarum. Immosnacaillet iarum Ailill &ersir; Medb. Farbbiba sochaide n-immund de rigaib Herend dia rucasom
in n-ingin. Aní is maith fuaiprem inna degaid &ersir; marbam fo chetóir resiu forruma bine fornn. Is liach ón ol Medb &ersir; is meth n-einich dúnn. Niba meth n-einig dúnn ol Ailill. Tucht ara ndalfarsa. Dotháet Ailill &ersir; Medb issa rrigthech. Tiagam ass ol Ailill co n-accamar na mmilchona oc toffund. co mmedón laí &ersir; combat
scítha. Tiagait ass uili iarum dond abainn dia fothrucud. Adfiadar dam ol Ailill at maith i n-uisciu. Tair issind linnisea co n-accammar do ⋅nám. Cindas na lindise ol se. ni &fdot;etamar nach &ndot;dodaing inti
ol Ailill &ersir; is comtig fothrucud inti. Gataid a étach de iarum &ersir; téit inti. &ersir; fácbaid a chriss túas. Oslaigid Ailill iarum a bossán dia éis.
&ersir; boí ind orndnasc and. Atageuin Ailill iarum. Tairchi a Medb ol Ailill. Dotháet Medb iarum. in n-aithchein sin ol Ailill. Aithgen ol si. Fosceird Ailill issin n-abaind sís. Ro airigestar Fráech anísin. Co n-accai ní dolleblaing in t-écne ara chend &ersir; gabsus inna béulu. Foceird bedg cucai &ersir; gaibid a oílech. &ersir; dotháet dochum tíri. &ersir;
dombeir i mmagin diamair. i mbrúch na haband. Dotháet do thuidecht assind usci iarum. Na tair ol Ailill co tuca chroíb dam din chairthend tall fil i mbruuch na haband. It aildi limm a chaera. Teitsium ass iarum. &ersir; brissis gesca din chrund &ersir; dambeir ria aiss tarsin n-uisci. Ba hed
iarum athesc Findabrach. nach álaind atchíd. Ba haildiu lee Fróech do acsin tar dublind. in corp do rogili. &ersir; in folt do roáilli. ind aiged do chumtachtai. in t⋅úil do roglassi. Iss he móethóclach cen locht cen ainm. co n-agaid &fdot;ocháel forlethain. Is é diriuch dianim In chraeb cosna cáeraib dergaib eter in mbragit &ersir; in n-agid &ndot;gil.
Iss ed atbered Findabair. nocon &fdot;acca ní rosaissed leth vel trían do chruth. Iar sain docuirethar na craeba dóib. assind usciu. It ségdái &ersir; it áildi na caera. Tuc tórmách dún díb. Téit ass atherruch co mbuí i mmedón ind usci. Gaibthi in beist assind uisci. Domiced claideb uaib ol se. & ní rabai forsin tír fer no lamad a thabairt do ar omun
Ailella &ersir; Medba. Iar sin gataid Findabair a hétach &ersir; focheird bedg issin n-uisce cossin chlaidiub. Dolleici a hathair sleig cóicrind di anuas rout n-aurchora co lluid tre da triliss. &ersir; condo ragaib Froech inna láim in slig. Fosceirdside issa tír súas in slig &ersir; a mmíl
inna tháeb. Léciud ón co forgabail. cenéle n-imberta gaiscid. co lluid tarsin tlacht corcra. &ersir; tresin léine baí im Ailill. La ssin coteirget ind óic la Ailill. Dotháet Findabair assind uisciu. amp facbaid in claideb i llaim &Fdot;raech. &ersir; co mben a chend den míl co mbaí fora thóeib. &ersir; dobert a mmíl leiss dochum tíre. Is de atá
Dublind Fráech i mBreib. i tírib Connacht. Téit Ailill &ersir; Medb ina ndún iarum. Mórgním dori&ndot;gensam ol Medb. Issinn aithrech ol Ailill a ndoringensam risin fer. Ind ingen i&mmacr; ol se atbélat a bbéoilside imbarach dadaig. &ersir; niba cin mbreithe in chlaidib beithir di. Dentar fothrucud lib dond irsai. enbruithe
n-úr⋅aille &ersir; cárna samaisci do indarggain fo thál &ersir; béuil &ersir; a thabairt issin fothrucud. Dogníth uile anísin. amal asbertsom. A chornairi iarum remisium dochum in dúine. Sennaitdi conid
abbad tricha fer di ⋅ainchaemaib Ailella ar ⋅írechtai. dothaet iarum isin dún. &ersir; téit issin fothrucud. Coneraig in banchuire imbi. ocon
dabaig dia mblith &ersir; dia &fdot;olcud a chind. Dobreth ass iarum &ersir; dogníth derguth. Co cualatar ní a &ndot;golgaire for Cruachnaib. Co n-accas na trí coícait ban co n-inaraib corcraib. Co cenbarraib uanidib. co milechaib arggait. fora ndóitib. Tiagair chuccu do &fdot;is scél dús cid ro chainset. Fráech mac Idaith ol in ben
macdreittel rig side &ndot;Herend. La sin rochluinethar Fraech a &ndot;golgaire. Domthócbaid ass ol se ria muntir. Gol mo matharsa in so &ersir; bantrochta Boinni. Tocabair immach la sodain. &ersir; berair cucu. Dothiagat na mná immi. &ersir; berdait uadib i sSíd Cruachan. Co n-accatar ní in tráth nóna arnabárach dotháet &ersir; coica ban
imme iss é úag⋅lán cen on cen anim. comaesa comdelba. comailli. comchaíni. comchórai. comchrotha. co n-ecosc ban síde impu. conna baí aithgne neich sech alaile díb. bec nad muchthá doíne impu. scarsat i ndorus ind liss. Atnagat a &ndot;gol oc dul úad. co corastar na daíni batar isind liss tar cend. Is de atá golgaire ban
síde la áes cíuil Herend. Teitseom iarum issin dún. Ataregat in t⋅lúaig húili ara chend. &ersir; ferait failti friss. Amal bad a domun aile thissad. Atraig Ailill &ersir; Medb. &ersir; dogniat aithrigi &ndot;dó dond es dori&ndot;gensat fris. &ersir; dogniat chóri. Gaibthir fledugud leu dadaig. Congair Fraech gilla dia
muntir. airg ass ol se cosin magin i ndeochadsa issin uisce. Éicne forácbusa and. Donuc do &Fdot;indabair. &ersir; irbbad fessin fair. &ersir; fonaither in t-écne lee co mmaith. &ersir; ata ind ordnasc i mmedón ind éicni. Is dóig lim condessar cuca innocht. Gabthus mesca &ersir; aruspeittet céola &ersir; airfiti. Asbert Ailill iarum
tucaid mo ⋅éotu damsa huili ol se. Dobretha dó iarum co mbatar ara belaib. Amra amra ol cách. Gairid damsa Findabair ol se. Dothaet Fi&ndot;dabair cucai. &ersir; coíca ingen impe. A ingen ol Ailill. ind ordnasc doratusa duit-siu inuraid in mair latt. Tuc dam cond accatar ind óic. Rot biasu iarum. Ni &fdot;etar ol si cid dernad de. Fintasu ém ol Ailill. Is eicen a cungid vel th'anim do dul asdo
churp. Nicon fíu ol ind óic atá mór di maith and chena. Ni fail ní dom ⋅étaibse nád tei dar cend na hingine ol Fraech. daig ruc in claideb dam do giull dom anmain. Ni fuil lat do ⋅étaib ní nodott ain mani aisce úadi ind ordnaisc. ol Ailill nicom thása cuma&ndot;g dia
tabair ol ind ingen anro chara dagne dimsa. Tú&ndot;gu dia to&ndot;ges mo thúaith atbelat do béoil meni aisce úait ol Ailill. is aire condegar
chucut. úair is decmai&ndot;g. ar rofetarsa co tísat na doíni atbathatar o thossuch domuin. ni thic assin magin in rolád. Nícon ticfa ri moín vel adlaic thra. ol ind ingen. in sét connegar and Tiagsa conda
tucsa úair is tricc condegar. ni regasu ol Ailill. Táet nech úait i&mmacr;. dia tabairt. Foídis ind ingen a inailt dia tabairt. To&ndot;gusa do dia tho&ndot;ges mo thúath dia faigbither nícon béosa fot chumachtasu bas ire. diandum roib forsa rol mo greis. Nicon gebsa ón dítsu ón cid cossin n-echaire théisi. ma fogabthar ind ordnasc. ol Ailill.
Dobert iarum ind inailt in méis issa rigthech &ersir; in t-éicne fonaithe fuirre. is é fuillechta fo mil dognith lassin n-ingin co maith. &ersir; boí ind ordnasc óir forsind eicni anuas. Dos&fdot;éccai Ailill &ersir; Medb. Dalei co ndercar ar Fráech &ersir; doéccai a bossán. Indar lemm is la teist foracbus mo chriss ol Fráech. for fír do &fdot;latha ol Fraech. apair cid
dernais dind ordnaisc. Ni cheltar orut ón ol Ailill. Lemsa ind ordnasc ro baí it bossan. &ersir; rofetar is Findabair dorat duit. Is iarum rolasa issin duiblinni. For fír th'ainich &ersir; t'anma a Froeich asndíth cia cruth arralad a thabairt ass. Ni céltar &fdot;ortsu ol Fráech A cétlá fosfuarsa ind ordnaisc i ndorus ind liss. Rofetar ropu
sét cáeim. Is airi dosroisechtsa co lléir im bossán. Rotchúalasa a llaa dochoad dond uisciu. Ind ingen rodlaa immach oco iarmoracht. Asbiurtsa frie cia lóg rom bia latt. ara fagbail. Asbertsi frimsa dombérad seirc &mdot;bliadna damsa. Ecmai&ndot;g nis ragbusa immum. Fosrácbus im thaig dim éis. Ni comairnecmarni co comairnecmar
oc tabairt in chlaidib issind abaind im láimse. Iar sin atchondarcsa in tan ra oslaicisiu in &mdot;bossan. &ersir; rollais ind ordnaisc issin uisce. atchonnarc in n-éicne dorroeblaing ara chind conid gab inna béolu. Ro ngabusa in n-éicni iarum cotnócaib issin mbrat darolus i lláim na hingine. Is he in t-eicnesin iarum fil forsin méis. Gaibthir admilliud
&ersir; adamrugud na scelsa is tegluch. Ni foíchursa mo menmain for óclach n-aile i nHerind it íadsiu ol Findabair. Arotnaisc dó ol Ailill &ersir; Medb. &ersir; tair chucunni cot búaib do tháin na mbó a Cuail&ndot;giu. &ersir; in tan doregasu cot búaib anair doridisi fíbaidsind in n-aidchisin d'adaig &ersir; Finndabair. Dagénsa anísin ol Fráech. Biit and iarum
co arnabarach. Gabais Fraech immi cona muntir. Celebraid iarum do Ailill &ersir; Meidb. Documlát da críchaib iarum. Ecmong ro gatá a bae calléic. Tanic a mathair chuce Ni béoda do &fdot;echtas ar si dochóas. Fofirfe mór n-imnid duit. Ro gatta do bai &ersir; do tri meicc &ersir; do ben
conda fail oc Sléib Aelpae Ataat teora bae díb i nAlbain tuascirt
la Cruthnechu. Ceist cid dogensa ol se ria máthair dogena nephthecht dia cungid. Ni thaibrea th' anmain &fdot;orru ol si. Rot biat bai lemsa chena ol si. Nim thá son ol se. Dochoid form einech &ersir; form anmain. Airec co Ailill &ersir; co Meidb co mbúaib do tháin na
mbáu a Cual&ndot;giu. Ni rochebthar ol a máthair a condaigi. Téiti úad iarum la sodain., Dochumláisom ass iarum tríb nonbaraib &ersir; fidchuach &ersir; cú lomna leu. Co lluid hi crich &ndot;hUlad. Co comairnaic ri Conall Cernach oc Bennaib Bairchi. Rádid a cheist friside. nibu ⋅irsan duit ol seside
aní ardottá ardottá mór n-imnid ol se cid and do beth do menma. Dommáirse ol Fraech ri Conall co ndichis lemm nach ré conarnec- mar. Ragatsa ém ol Conall Cernach. Documlat ass a triur tar muir sair i mBretnu tar Saxanu. tuascirt. tar Muir Hicht co tuascert Longbard co rrancatar Sleibte Aelpae co n-accatar fraccnatain oc
ingairiu chairech ara cind. Tiagam ar ndís ol Conall a &Fdot;roích co n-acaldam in mnai thall. & anat ar n-óic sund. Lotar iarum di acaldaim. Asbertsi. can dúib. Di &fdot;eraib Herend ol Conall. Nipu ⋅irsan do &fdot;eraib Herend ém tíchtain in tírise. Do &fdot;eraib Herend em mo mathairse. Domfair ar chondailbi. Aisnid ní dún diar
n-imthechtaib. Cinnas in tire dorancamar. Tír &ndot;duaig n-uathmar. co n-ócaib ansib. regait for cech leth do thabairt bó &ersir; ban &ersir; brat ol si. Cid as nuidem tucsat ol Frech Bai Fraech meic Idaith a iarthur Herend &ersir; a ben &ersir; a thrí meic. Unse a ben lasin ríg. ondát a bai issin tír arfar &mdot;belaib. Donfairni do chobair ol Conall. Is bec mo
chumang acht eolas nammá Iss é Fraech inso ol Conall &ersir; it é a baí tuctha. In tairisi libsi in ben ol si. Cid tairissi lind in tan dolluid bés ni tarissi iar tiachtain. Ben taithigi na báu airgid a dochum. Eprid frie for toisc. Di &fdot;eraib Herend a cenel di Ultaib in t⋅ainriuth Tiagait co suidiu. ardagaibet &ersir; no slaindet dí &ersir; ferais fáilti fríu.
Cichib fobruireth ol si. Fonroireth imned ol Conall. lem na baí &ersir; in ben fil issind liss. Nibu sirsan duib ém ol si. dul fo dirimm inna mná Andsu dúib cech rét ol si. Ind naithir fail oc imdegail ind liss. nim thír ainm ol Fraech. Ni tairissi limm. At arisisiu limm. Rofetamar nín mera uaire is di Ultaib duit. Can di Ultaib dúib ol
si. Huinse Conall Cernach sund laech as dech la Ultu ol Fraech. Focheirdsi di láim im bragit. Conaill Cernaig. Reiss ind orgain hifechtsa ol si. Úaire dondanicside. Uair is do suide dorair&ndot;gered
orgain in dúinisea. Tiagsa ass ol sisi. ni beo fri &mdot;blegon na mbó Faiceb in less n-óibela. Is mé no n-iada. Asbér is déol ro dinetar
ind loíg. Tístaisi issin dún acht comtalat. Iss andsu dúib ind naithir fail ocon dún. Dolléicetar iltuatha di. Regmai ámin ol Conall. Fuabbrait in less. Focheirdd ind naithir bedg i criss Conaill Cernaig. & orgait in dún fo chetóir. Tessairgit iarum in mnaí &ersir; na tri maccu. &ersir; doberat a n-as dech sét in dúine. &ersir; leicid Conall in nathir assa
chriss. &ersir; ni dergeni nechtar de olc fria chéile. &ersir; dothiagat i crích Cruithentuathe. co tuc a teora bú día mbuaib assaide. Co tullatar do Dún Ollaich meic Briuin friu co mbatar i nAird hua nEchach. Is and atbath gilla Conaill oc timmain na mbói. Bicne mac Laegaire. Is de ata Inber mBicne oc Bennchur. co tucsat a mbú taris illei.
Iss and rolásat a n-adarca díb. conid de atá Trach &mdot;Bennchoir. Luid Fraech ass iarum dia chrich iarum &ersir; a ben. &ersir; a meicc &ersir; a bai laiss. Co luid l.a Ailill &ersir; Meidb do tháin na mbó a Cual&ndot;giu. Finit. finit. Amen.

div1.head: Fochond Loi&ndot;gse Fergusa meic Roig in so sís.,
div1.p:
BAtar Ulaid i nEmain Macha oc fledugud oc feiss Emna. Is éside tres fes as chaínem ro boí in Heire .i. fess Temra. &ersir; fess Emna. &ersir; fess i nIarthur Chonnacht. Tri fichit ildana no bitis in cech ae. Batar Ulaid oc fess lae n-and. Ni thanic Fergus. vel Dubthach Doel Ulad. Tanaic dias oac fene do Emain Macha. Da
écland da thren&fdot;er Mael demis chirdub for cechtar de. Cia focherdtha dorn lán d'&fdot;íadublaib fora cenna no giulad fora finn. Ara n-acairbi. batir mesráini a ndí ⋅úil. Bátir cuirridir og. batir dubidir cir. batir metithir coire colpthaige a &ndot;glúine. No sceirtfide saland méich di chechtar dena da llurggan. Leithir leth &ndot;dam⋅eiche cechtar a nda
thraig. Ba mmóir choire ndarta cechtar a nda odbrand. Brothrach co lluibnib finnaib im chechtar de. ro iurtha mac secht &mdot;bliadan di cec mbrothairniu. ro boí foraib sciath for muin cechtar de. Ba lleithir dómain dabcha. Taul for ba mmóir scabail cairech. Sleg conduala miled i llaim chechtar de. indar latt ba mór &mdot;bliadna ro batar fo
diaid. Dubidir domain coire cechtar a nda &ndot;gnúsa. Batir gilidir snechta a fiaclai. Batir méit fiacla cámaill. Batir móir claideb &ndot;garmna a nda claideb. Andar latt ba mór &mdot;bliadna o batar fo thalmain. Inda llatt bá culscian srúb cechtar de. Da liaigdelgg n-iairn ina mbrutt. Batir leithidir trí artemu. Batir finna na lluachracha
dia n-éis oc imthecht. Tecat dochum nEmna. Dotháet in dorsaid dia n-acaldaim. Cinnas atuber ol suide. Amal atoncossin ol ⋅eat. Ni táet fer cen dán i nEmain. Cia dán dongniid ol ⋅e. Ni óendán ón ol seat. Turim ni dún ol in dorsaid. Doronam chétus comrac ri feraib. Ammin maith oc lo&ndot;gud. Ro elamar cor clocha. gabla. &ersir; atud
teined. Tiagsa dī co n-aprur ol in dorsaid. Atafétsaide iarum issind rigthaig. cona cruth &ersir; a n-ecose &ersir; a ndan. Dosléic issind liss

airgit oengil friu. lénti bangela co n-esnadaib corcraib iar tóebaib impu. Sceith órbuide co mbilib argit oengil fora munib co fethaib &ersir; co ndualaib &ersir; co n-imlib finddruini &ersir; nealtnebtha dib. Claidib
debennacha mora co n-eltaib dét co n-imduirnib airgdidib for a cressaib. Da maelgai i llaim cech &fdot;ir dib co semmannaib argait. baí dano torachta di ór forloiscthi im cech ngai dib. Ni bátar assai imma cossaib na celbair imma cennaib. In tres buiden dano .i. in buiden i mbai Mani fodéin. Coica ech
dergdond seta sithméti inti. &ersir; coica ech find n-óiderg. It é scuaplebra iarna rusiud i corcair uile .i. a scópa &ersir; a mo&ndot;ga. Srein delinecha friu. .i. bolga dergóir isindara liniu &ersir; bolga airgit oengil isin líne aile. Belgi oir &ersir; argit friu uile. Maelchircul óir co clucinib fo bragit cech eich díb. ba binnithir téta mendchrott oca senmaim i lláim
súad fogur na clucinsin. ica fogluasacht dona echaib ina cémmennaib. Carpait &fdot;oduirn findruini co n-asnadaib óir &ersir; argit eter cech da n-ech díbside. Coica sadall corcra co snáthib argit estib i ce&ndot;gul do chrettaib na carpat &ersir; co siblaib oir estib immach. dar borddaib na carpat co cendmílaib i&ndot;gantachaib foraib. Coíca gilla n-óc n-aig&fdot;ind
n-imlebur isin choícait charputsin. & ni baí nech díb acht mac ríg &ersir; rigna &ersir; curad cathmiled do Chonnachtaib .l. brat corcra cortharach impu co cortharaib ecair óir &ersir; argit. Cethri ora umaidi ar cech brut. mílech do dergór &fdot;orloiscthi in cech brut. Lenti srebnaidi sítai co tuagnadmannaib di ór bruthi buide i custul fria &ndot;gelchnessaib. l. cathsciath n-airgdide cona timtimchiull d'ór &ersir; co mbreccad gemm
carrmocoil &ersir; lec lógmar cech datha for muinib leo. Dá chaindill gaiscid di ⋅legaib cóicrinnechaib i lláim cech &fdot;ir díb.l. semmand d'indruini &ersir; d'ór in cech gai dib. Ciano dlestá miach óir do cech &fdot;ir dib no ícfad seim gai cech &fdot;ir dib é Torochta d'ór forloiscthi im
cech gai dib. irthocbáil dano do charmoclaib fóthib uile cona n-ilbreccad di gemmaib lógmaraib. No lastais trá in aidchi amal ruthni greni. l. claideb n-órduirn n-intlaisse co n-eltaib dét ecoir oir &ersir; argit. i trúallib fichthib finnargit fora cressaib dóib.l. echlasc
findruini co mbaccánaib óir ina lamaib. Ba caemalaind iarum &ersir; ba
cruthach in maccoem baí eturru. is e leccan&fdot;ota lan⋅olus. drechlethan. Folt fochas orbuide fírlebor fair co sniged co brainni a imda. Rosc n-airard n-adanta is e gorm glainidi ina chind. Ba cosmail fri cléithe caille cetamain fri sian slébi cechtar a da gruad. Andar latt ba fross do nemannaib rolaad ina chend. Andar latt bátar da dúal partaingi
a beoil. ba gilithir snechta oenaidchi a brági &ersir; a chnes chena. Sect milcoin imma charpat i slabradaib argit &ersir; ubull óir for cech slabraid combá leór ceol fogur na n-ubull frisna slabradaib. noco rabi dath na rabi isna conaib bátar aice. Mórfeisiur cornaire co cornaib óir &ersir; argit leo co n-etaigib illdathaib impu co mongaib
finbuide foraib Bátar tri druí rempu co mindaib airgdidib uaas cennaib co mbrattaib breccaib impu. & co sciathaib umaidib &ersir; co n-asnaidib credumai foraib. Trí cruittiri co n-écosc rigda for cech ae ina comair i mbrattaib corcraib. Rancatar iarum fon tachimsin co Cruachain &ersir; ro &fdot;ersat a trí
graiphni oenaig for faichthi na Cruachna. Celebrait iar sin do Meidb &ersir; do Ailill. & tiagait fon cummasin i cend séta &ersir; imthechta for ammus Ratha Ini. Is caín tíachtain chetus ol Bricriu. ni &fdot;etar in ba caín ticfaithi. Biaid dul dia fiastar ar Mani. Rofitir me ar Bricriu is ruathur laí dogentaí ni anfaidi fri feiss aidchi i cuiciud
Chonchobuir. Doberimse mo brethir ar Mani coro eram feis trí laa &ersir; tri n-aidchi i ndunud Geirg na tairchem arís co Cruachain. Ni boí ní ba siriu ic fiamuch ráid ríu acht téit i cend séta &ersir; imthechta. Iar rochtain tra do bé thastil co dunud Geirg ro gabad oc frithálim in t⋅luaig and. Ro ésraít a tigi do bethi barralaind barrglas &ersir; essair
urard úrluachra. Foídis Erb a comalta .i. Findchoem ingen Ergi aróen ri bé tastil do &fdot;egad in t⋅lúaig amal ticfaitís. Nirbo chían ém disi ón. Oro scaich di mess forru. Luid fri deminscél cosin &ndot;grianán i mboí Ferb. & ro ráid fria Atchiusa ar si dírim don dúnsa &ersir; oro gab Conchobor Emuin noco tanic rempi &ersir; noco ticfa co bruinne
mbratha dirim is áilliu vel is choemiu vel is ilchlessachu andás in dirim docechai&ndot;g in mag innossa. Is samail lim &ersir; bad i n-aballgort chumrai no beind lasin &mdot;balad tánic dia n-étaigib ar &ndot;dochum iarna fogluas- acht don maethgaíth doic tairsiu. Cech cless &ersir; cech abairt dogní in t-óclách fil eturru nocon &fdot;accasa riam a leithéit. focheirt a bunsaig
rót n-urchair uad. foche&ndot;gat a choin inna diaid. co tecat a choin eturru &ersir; lár &ersir; in t-óclach eturru &ersir; firmimint conna ric lár conas gabat eturru fon cummasin. La sodain tra tecait slúaig dunaid Geirg coro múchait sé fir déc dib ica fégad. Tairli&ndot;git i ndorus in
dúne iar sin. &ersir; tairniter a carpait &ersir; scoirtir a &ndot;grega. & tecait innund
isin dúnud. &ersir; ferthair firchain fáilti friu. & dognither gríth gretha do glan&fdot;othrucud dóib. Doratad iar sin isin laechthech mór boí ar comair drechi in dunaid. Dosrochtatar fo chetóir airigthi airerda do cech biud sainemail boí for druimleirg in talman. In tan tra ba hane dóib bith ic tochathium a flede dodechaid
sidi gaíthi géri galbigi coro chroth dindgna in dúnaid uli &ersir; coro chrithnaig in tech claraid i mbaí in slúag co torchratar a scéith dia ndelgnaib &ersir; a slega dia n-adlennaib. &ersir; coro sétea a mmíasa uadib amal dulli darbri. Machtnaigit ind óic desein. & ro iarfaig Gerg do drui Mani cid ro im&fdot;ulai&ndot;g in gáethsin. Is and sin ro
recair Ollgaeth druí Mani. Indar lind ém ar sé ní fó sén i tancas din tochmarcsa innocht. Dabarró Conchobor dafoichlid co mbrisfea cath for Meidb isin matainsea imbárach iar far ndíth uili in lín itaid is tig & dormg&ndot;i in glónáthi airchetailseo iar sin.

lg.l: Deilm in gaeth granni in grith
Bás meic ríg do lágin ríg

div1.p:
Diambad fómsa trá cách ol in druí no faicfithea in dunadsa innocht. Ro cairigedsom ó Mani co garb airesin. Is ed ro ráid Gerg. ní baí ní ara fubthaitis occu. ar ni rabatar curaid vel cathmílid Ulad aróen ri Conchobor. Cenco beth sibsi etir sund ar se dobéraindsea &ersir; mo da mac cath do Chonchobur. Ra tócbait a n-airm
leo iar sin. &ersir; ni thartsat dia n-airi a n-ebairt in druí. Dia mbaí dano Conchobor i tosuch ind laísin ina cotlud i nEmain &ersir; a rígan na &fdot;arrad .i. Mugain Etanchaithrech ingen Echach Feidlig. Co n-acca in mnaí coem ina dochum ina imdaí
Ecosc rignaide lé mo&ndot;g casdrumnech barrbuide i cuacris imma
cend. sretha sítai fria gelchnes. bréit bláthmin máeth do sítu uanidi imma bragit. Da maelassa &fdot;indruine etera bonnu bláthmini &ersir; talmain. Tó cech maith duit a Chonchobuir. Cid fil dúinn deside ar Conchobor. Secht &mdot;bliadna ó 'nocht ar si dogentar táin bó Cual&ndot;gi. &ersir; airgfitir Ulaid &ersir; berthair in Dond Cualngi. & mac ind
&fdot;ir dogena sin .i. Mani Mórgor mac Ailella &ersir; Medba dodechaid do feis la hEirb ingin n&ndot;Geirg do Glind Gerg tri choícait a lín. Erigsiu ar si trí coicait fomorach cucu &ersir; bid latt coscur. Bidgais Conchobor iar sin &ersir; dúscis a rigain. &ersir; adfét di a aislingi. Is lór ém ar Mugain fil chena etrund &ersir; Connachta. Is demin ém ar se cid nar tost bemni
dogentar in táin út. Déni a chomairli ri Cathbad ar Mugain &ersir; in chomairli dobera duit corop hí dogneis. Rádid Conchobor iar sin fri Cathbad. ara ndernad fastini dó & dori&ndot;gni rand tosaig laíde iar sin &ersir; ro &fdot;recair Cathbad hé

lg.l: Na slúaig út ón Chruachain chaises
ar is móti da blad trá

div1.p:
Doroichisiu im⋅lán a rí ar se co mbuaid &ersir; coscur. &ersir; commaidim.
Is and sin doroacht Cathach Catutchend ingen Dímóir co Emain. bangaiscedach amra iside. á iathaib Espáni tánic ar ⋅eirc Con Culaind co Emain. dochuaid issin sochraite sin aróen ri Conchobor Doriachtatar dano triar amra a finib Fomórach and fo blad barbardachta ad .i. Siabarchend mac Sulremair. & Berngal Brec.
&ersir; Buri Borbbriathrach. Dorocht dano and Fácen mac Dublongsig do ⋅entuathaib Ulad. & Fabric Fiacail Nemi asind Asia Móir. amp Forais Fingalach a Manaind. Luid iarum Conchobor tri choicait laech impusin &ersir; ni ruc nech do Ultaib leis. acht sé féin &ersir; a ara .i. Brod &ersir; Imrind in druíi. mac Cathbath. Ni baí dano gilla oc neoch
díb. acht gilla Conchobuir acht a scéith fora munib leo &ersir; a llaigne lethanglassa ina llámaib. &ersir; a claidib tromma tortbullecha fora cressaib. Niba lín tra ba mesta forru. bá mór a toilc menman. Oro siachtatar iarum co mbatar ic fegad in dúnaid uathu innund atchonncatar tromnél dímór uas chind in dúnaid. Cirdub indara
cend dó &ersir; dergg a medon &ersir; glass in cend aile. Iarfaigis Conchobor iar sin cid co tircran a Imrind ar se in nél út atchiam uasin dunud Tirchanaid ém ar Imrind ág &ersir; urbaid na haidchi innocht. & doringni in rethoricseo iar sin. .R. Dubnél nemi. glass erchad. imfaebor derg. crua credbaigthi
fo bíth tescfaiter taíb. leonfaitir lama. cirrfitir colla. maelfaitir muneóil i ndunad Geirg o thrath nóna nithaige co medón laí lechtlige di lar óc dalfid écdubi. D Cechaing Conchobor iar sin ar ammus in dunaid. Is and sin dano ro sudiged dabach umai thall is taig diarb a chomainm Ol Gualai.
iar sin. & robas oca línad dond &fdot;ín. Dorochair dano a escra féig finnargait a lláim in daleman isin dabaig coro dóirt a trí tonna dar borddaib di. Is and ro ráid Ollgáeth in druí .R. All amae ol in druí brod in airigid niba cían la hallmuri bías ar focrechtnaigfiter sluaig airdibdibther laechrad. dobrisfiter
tige fogeba Emain ditui ar focerthar gala oen&fdot;er eter laí &ersir; aidche. eter slóg Geirg &ersir; Conchobuir isin tegdaise innocht ní fó mac ruc mathair isin taigsea innocht. Doroich Conchobor in dorus &ersir; gárit na hallmaraig gáir airgni
iar sin amal ba bés dóib immon dunad. Ergid Gerg iar sin &ersir;
érgit a da mac .i. Cond Coscarach. &ersir; Cobthach Cnesgel &ersir; gabait a n-armu. & rádis Gerg fri Mani. leicsiu etruind féin innar nUltaib. co fessara cia úain bas chalmiu bidbaid duitsiu sind uile. Is fó duit ar comthuttim aroén. mad sinni dothaeth and geibsiu it chind dia féta. Téit Gerg immach iar sin &ersir; a da mac cona muntir léo.
& foroprait ar gabáil in dúnaid. &ersir; ar chathugud fri Conchobor immach &ersir; ní lecat nech forro indund fri ré cían. Fecht n-oen trá téit Gerg darin dorus immach fri cnes urgaile &ersir; for&fdot;obair fora thaffond ind loích on dúnud immach. & ros geib sroigled &ersir; essorcon do cech aí &ersir; do cech airchind immon dúnud &ersir; dofuittet cuiciur
fomorach laiss don ruathursin. &ersir; dofuit leiss in druíi. Imrind mac Cathbad &ersir; benaid a chend de &ersir; berid leis in cend innund ar ammus in doruis. Is and sin dodechaid Cathach Catutchend eturru &ersir; in dorus. &ersir; dorat comrac féig fichda dósom. araísin co topacht Gerg in cend
dísi. &ersir; berid leiss innund issin tech boí Mani. iarna chrechtnugud co mmór. & foceird na cinnu úad i fiadnaisi Mani. &ersir; suidis na imdaí iar sin &ersir; ataig a osnaid ass. &ersir; conattacht dig. Rosaig Conchobor andside cona muntir co mbátar fri cnes in t⋅onnaig. & tócfait a sciathu úasa cennaib ina lámaib cléi &ersir; sraccait in sonnach cucu
immach dia lámaib desaib &ersir; ce&ndot;gait co mbatar for lár in dúni. &ersir; ba oendorus dóib andside iar &mdot;brisiud in da&ndot;gin. Is and sin dolleici Brod uad indara sleig buí ina láim innond istech conos tarla triasin scíath boí for inchaib ind ríg Geirg &ersir; conos tarla tria eslind a chuirp corbo chross tall tarsna triana chlíab iar tregdad
a chride. &ersir; co ndechaid tria Airidech .i. gilla Geirg. co torcratar a ndís cen anmain. Immasaí Conchobor iar sin fo slúag Geirg sechnón in dúnaid co torchair tricha láech leis do muntir Geirg do gním a lámi fém a oenur. cenmothá ina torchair ria muntir. Dorochratar dano sochaide dia muntirseom leosom.
Is and trá atraacht Nuagel ingen Ergi .i. ben Geirg &ersir; dorat a trí foídi ferggacha guil esti. & ro gab cend a fir ina hucht. Dar brethir ém ar si is mór in gním gillai dori&ndot;gni Brod .i. Gerg do marbad ina thig féin. Is sochaide trá ar si bias icot chainiud. &ersir; ciaro thuttis im cha&ndot;gin t'ingini mór n-ingen i rraba féin chardes.
&ersir; dorat a thesta for aird. &ersir; doringni rand tosaid laide.

lg.l: Iss é Gerg so ina ligi
Mor in comlund ro gab Greg.
ca fróech na figed fri feirg;
ca slúag na caínfed do bás
cen tlás na scaílfea dot éis.
a chara na cuan in cech than.
ic Loch Áne is ic Irard;
ba maith ri cách do gráibri,
is and rot gáet i nn-inud ríg
Rot gaet Brod is níro dlig.
tú féin is do gilla thair
ro marb sé sinni &ersir; sé IS é

div1.p:
Foropairset dano dá mac Geirg béus .i. Cobthach Cnesgel &ersir; Cond Coscarach ar gabáil in dúnaid &ersir; niro scandir cen échta dóib. Niro dámair in mórbríg do Mani bith ina thost cen techt féin do digail a chlemna for Ultaib. & atraacht iar sin &ersir; ro gab a scíath mór
míleta fair &ersir; a da ⋅leig slemungéra uillendcha móra ina láim. & a chlaideb trom tortbuillech crúadgér comramach fora chriss. &ersir; atraactatar a thrí coicait i n-oen&fdot;echt fris. Nirbo irusa a &fdot;rithalim ba mór in toilg menman &ersir; aicnid &ersir; intinsaitin úalli ro boí i cridi cech óen dibsin. Ro boí dano sant mór &ersir; duthracht calmai do denam
occu. Bá ségda súairc sobesach in rígmacc boí rempu. &ersir; ciarbo maccoem iar n-aís ropo mílid iar mórgasciud. ba halgen curmthigi. is ba dúr debtha. &ersir; ba nathir nemi. Bá cumnech écraiti. Ba oíbel ága. bá comnart comergi. ba logthanach sét. ba hanaccarthach imgona. ba tene aradna. bá nertlia fergi. ba tond bratha ar buirbe.
bá íaru ar athlaimi. ba dair ar damgni. ba hé rind ága &ersir; imgona na teora Connacht. &ersir; ba hé a cendmíl airechta &ersir; a lám thairberta sét &ersir; a sodomna ríg. Nirbo miad leis nech isin domun do thiachtain fo chomlín do gabail tige fair. Ro thaffniset iarum iar sin na fomórchu on tig
immach. Nirbo lám lega la Mani in n-uairsin. & dorochratar nonbur fomorach dia chétscundscli a oenur. Is and sin doriacht dibergach na hAsia Móri .i. Fabric Fiacail Nemi fri cnes na debtha. & ro gab sroigled &ersir; essorcoin &ersir; brúd &ersir; básugud in t⋅lúaig remi. &ersir; ni ragbad riss co rrocht cosin magin i mbaí Mani co tard cechtar n-aí díb scíath fri
scíath dia cheli. &ersir; bátar isin chomlund co ndechaid dar medon aidchi. &ersir; dorat Fabric tri gona aidbli for Mani. &ersir; ro dichend Mani esium iar scís chomluind. Cid Conchobor dano bá gal churad leis ar dorochratar tricha laech lánchalma leis do muntir Geirg imma mac .i. im Chond Coscarach. Ro immir trá in slúag cechtarda immforrán
fora cele. is bec naro chomraicset mera a coss. icond imthuarcain. Rosiacht fuil glúni fer sechnón in dunaid. Atchlos fon trichu chét
ba nesom dóib blobemnech na scíath &ersir; na bocóte &ersir; scemgal inna laigne lethanglas &ersir; na claideb crúadgér. i comrac. &ersir; briscbrúar na clocend ica n-erlech &ersir; búridach na míled ic immirt écomlaind forru.
Ro socht trá Mani iar &ndot;díth na Fomorach co Fácen mac &ndot;Dublo&ndot;gsig co mbátar fri ré cían i cathugud. Dorochair Facen deside. Dorochair dano Siaburchend mac Slisremuir ra Cobthach Cnessgel mac Geirg. & ro tafned Mani &ersir; Cobthach iar sin issin rigthech iar cor áir a muntire. &ersir; ro gabsat co setrech &ersir; co ferda in
tech co mmatain &ersir; m deochas forru ind. Is i nderiud na haidchisin dochuaid in ben chétna adfét na scéla do Chonchobur. co rocht co Meidb áit i mbaí ina cotlud ina himdaí i Cruachain Aí Co n-erbairt fria. dia mbeth fastini ocut ar si a Medb níbad chotlud dogenta. Cid and sin ar Medb. Ata
Conchobor ar si oc gabail ar Mani &ersir; dofáeth leis Mani &ersir; eirgsiu innossa &ersir; non dígela. & dorat rand tosaig laide. &ersir; ro recair Medb triana cotlud.

lg.l: A bé bán bulid co llí
coro thogla innocht for Glend Gerg.
Cia bail i tá Gerg is Mani.
ma tát ní hassa a togail.
bid díth cethern bid ár slog;
mad dia n-erge innossa a Medb. A.

div1.p:
Dúscid Medb iar sin &ersir; dúscis Ailill. &ersir; adfét dó in fís atchonnairc &ersir; adfét fon slúag iar sin. Nibó fír ón ém ar Bricriu. O 'tchuala Fiannamail mac Ferguis Fordeirg sin .i. mac rechtaire na Cruachna níro ernaid fri cách. acht luid remi i n-iarmoracht Mani.
ar bá comalta dósom Mani. ar rop é in t-ochtmad maccóem na Cruachna Fiannamail. Togais Medb lé secht fer n-armach a n-as dech dorala i Cruachain in tansin. Is and sin doriacht Domnall Derg Drechlethan mac Dubain meic Ingamna. laech heside is dech ro boí ar cúl scéith &ersir; claidib &ersir; gai i coiciud Chonnacht.
& bá comalta dil dano do Mani heside. & dochuaid issin sligi cétnai ria cach. Tricha láech dano ba hed a lín. &ersir; Domnall ainm cech fir díb. Imthigis dano Medb iar sin ina réim ina ndíaid. Aslingi Medba connice sin &ersir; turthed a himthechta. Imthús i&mmacr; Mani thair. Ro gab ina chind co maethráth éirgi
arnabarach. &ersir; nirbo ⋅ám subach sadail ro cathed ind adaigsin eturru maróen Ó 'manacca dóib ri suilsi ind laí ro chumnig cách a anfolaid dia cheli. & forópair Conchobor ar gressacht a muntire. Diamtís Ulaid ar se no betis immalle frimsa ní fulé&ndot;gtha in cath amal &fdot;uil&ndot;githir d'&fdot;omórchaib. Ro drebaing gal i mbrunnib na fomorach
don gressacht mórsin &ersir; dosratsat co dúr &ersir; co díchra frisin cathugud &ersir; niro ansat di co ndechatar dar dorsib ind rígthigi innund. Ba cóem ém &ersir; ba hirgna in phelait rígda i ndechas and. Ba líach droch- aradu furri. Ro boí cét mías findargit &ersir; tri chét do chredumu &ersir; tri chet do &fdot;inddruini and. Bátar dano tricha escra do airgiut oengil
Espáne ar borddaib dabach. Batar dano da cét corn buabaill co
n-imdenam óir &ersir; argit &ersir; tricha coppán argit &ersir; tricha coppán créduma. & cethracha gagar. Imsci&ndot;g línanairt gil co ndelbaib mgantachaib fri fraigid and. Is and sin immarocht don t⋅lúag cechtarda for lár in tigi. Ropo díth don t⋅lúag co mór and sin.
Rosiacht Cobthach Cnesgel mac Geirg iar slaidi na fomórach cosin magin i mboí Berngal Brec ic dichendugud na Connachtach. Dofuit Berngal tra la Cobthach iar scís chomlaind. Dorochair dano Buri Borbriathrach do laim Mani. &ersir; ro dased immi iar sin &ersir; ro n-immir for slúag na fomorach sechnon in tigi. &ersir; dorochair tricha
laech dib leis. Ó 'tchonnairc in cur cróda cathbuadach Conchobor in lainni forsa rabi Mani ro ndírig a dochum &ersir; ro frithailseom Mani co fichtha furachair &ersir; bátar fri ré cían i cathugud. &ersir; ro brissiset nonbor maccoem fo cossaib. Teilgis Mani rout n-urchair co feirg &ersir; lonnus co mboí ina chrois trí Chonchobar. &ersir; céin boí Conchobor
oc béim na sleigi ass ro gon Mani don mánáis lethanglais boí ina láim. &ersir; dodechaid Brod i foirithin Conchobair. &ersir; ferais Mani tri crechta aidbli fair. &ersir; nírbo ⋅étrech comlaind Brod iar sin. Impáis Conchobor iar sin fri Mani &ersir; ron ecrand do bráthbemmennaib do cech aird. co torchair leis marb cen anmain &ersir; for&fdot;opair iar sain ar
erlech in t⋅lúaig imme do cech leith isin tig. co torchratar bond fri bond &ersir; médi fri medi sechnon in tigi. Cid fil and trá acht ní thérna nech i mbethaid dona tri coicdaib laech dodechaid la Conchobor acht sé féin &ersir; Brod. &ersir; cid ed ón ni slán ternátar. Tafnís Conchobor Cobthach mac Geirg ón dúnud immach. & i céin ro boí
ina lenmain sechnón in maigi dochuaid ind ingen .i. Ferb ingen Geirg &ersir; bé thastil immalle fria cosin magin i mboí Mani ina chróligi &fdot;ola. &ersir; ina chropartaig &ersir; ro boí oc derfadaig &ersir; oc mifri. Dar brethir ém ar si ci ataí th' oenur innossa mór n-aidchi robá sochaide & dorat in laidsea oc tabairt a thesta.

lg.l: A gillai is derg do lepaid
olc sén i tanac ó tig.
ní latt in gním ro maídis;
Is trúag rim chride is rom chlí
ciaro boí do dál ri nech.
Ropo garb do lám sin chath.
mór fúaim do builli fri cend.
ni lugaite in grád cen chess.
Is sáeth lim in lihi i taí
Rop annam lat bith cen t'arm.
corot gaet in gai glan gle.
's coro sil bróen fola dar grúaid
A bratt corcra i nn-inud ríg.
dar eis nir gab nech úad
Sé féin ar lar in taigi.
's a gai 's í laech ras cuir.
trúag a ndul uili ar nefní'
mór a n-osnad tan ros cab
mairg dia muntir miad glan gle.

div1.p: Is and sm doroacht Fiannamail mac Fergusa Forderg trí choícait laech cucu. Ro tuarascaib ind echlach disi & ro innis scéla garba dósom. Ro dassed immisium iar sin. & ro iarair eolas airm i faigbed Chonchobor. &ersir; doringset laid eturru.

lg.l: cid maith a bés oca thig
ro scar do grés ria muntir.
A ingen is garb in scél
ro marbsat ro marbtha i fat
apair rim cia bail i tá
's a trí tri Brod ni imcén
ni beoda a dula cen geiss.

div1.p:
Imthigid Fiannamail iar sin i n-iarmoracht Conchobuir co tarla Niall Cend&fdot;ind mac Conchobuir ina agaid. &ersir; cét fer n-armach do thegluch Conchobuir immalle fris ic iarraid Chonchobuir. Ro ferad gleo fíchda feochair eturru. Maroen ro imred forlond fer for Fianna- mail deside. &ersir; nir damad cert comlaind dó náco torchair marb cen
anmain. Dorochair dano trícha laech laisium a oenur. For&fdot;opair and sin ind ingen ic fegad gilla Connacht. Dar brethir ém ar si ni ar meth gascid ná he&ndot;gnama dorochrabairsi acht forlond do imbirt foraib. &ersir; ummoro tra ar si darochair far comlund libsi cia dorochrabair. &ersir; ro chan in laidseo sis.

lg.l: ro dedail gleo i n-uar collaib.
bar scél is crúaid 's is cai&ndot;gnech.
ic scailiud dér is ic mifrig;
Sib slúag rop áilliu i nHerind
cach oen ros marb ní seguind
Ropo mór far muirn sin chath
a llus airm lór a chruadi

div1.p:
Doroacht iar sin Domnall Derg Drechlethan mac Dubain faichthi in dúnaid. Maith ém a llus gai &ersir; claidib ar bé thastil Domnall Derg mac Dubain. Lond fri úair &ndot;gascid cách tanic and &ersir; ropad mór a chobair dia chomaltu diana tairsed ina bethaid. O 'tchuala ind
ingen sin dodechaid immach ina agid &ersir; ro gress co mór &ersir; doringni rand &ersir; ros frecair Domnall Derg Drechlethan.

lg.l: im gaís im gasced im gart
or ni tharga is nir gein
Daig is esium féin ro beb.
dot láim dremain a Domnaill. A.

div1.p:
Nirbo chían inn irnaide do Domnall co n-acca chuci in &mdot;buidin móir i mbátar cethri chet fer n-armach im &Fdot;eradach Lám&fdot;ota mac
Conchobuir. Imsaí cách díb dochum a chéli. Ro imred forlín fer andside for Domnall. &ersir; ro dásed immisium &ersir; dorochair coíca láech lais &ersir; dorochair fer cech &fdot;ir dia muntir. &ersir; ro gonsom féin Feradach badí Dori&ndot;gned guin galand desium and sin &ersir; ro díchend Feradach hé &ersir; rolá a ulaig commaidmi. &ersir; ro díchennait a munter &ersir; rolaad a
n-ulach commaidmi. Dochuaid ind ingen iar sin co mbaí ic fégad Mani. Is étig ar si atathar and sin innossa a gillai. &ersir; bam marb dot chumaid. cid tréot ro marbad m'athair &ersir; a mac. &ersir; is dóig niba hed amáin dia tora Medb &ersir; doringni in laidsea sis tria thursi.

lg.l: Trúag ám sin a meic Medba.
is triut ro marbad a mac.
is mairg na cifea dar lind.
ro scar do chend rit cholaind.
tasc a brathar di co feirg.
ni mé naba lór truage. T.

div1.p:
Is and sin rasochtatar a da mac co Conchobor .i. Niall &ersir; Feradach. Darocht dano Medb co secht cétaib láech lé co mboí as cind ind armaige. Dori&ndot;gni crúadchippi grinni bec di. &ersir; torcaib idna catha rempi &ersir; ros dírig ar ammus Conchobair do digail a
mmeicc &ersir; a muntire fair. & ciarbo chnedach crechtach Conchobor nocon ic imgabail Medba ro boí acht is 'ca iarraid. conos tarla tul fri tul. Gebid cách díb sroigled &ersir; essorcoin. leod &ersir; letrad brúd &ersir; básugud a chele. Rofuc Medb andside tolc míled i cath na nUltach co torchair cóiciur lee. im dá mac Conchobuir .i. im Níall Cend&fdot;ind
&ersir; im &Fdot;eradach Lam&fdot;ota. Ro gab dano Conchobor scaindred &ersir; répad &ersir; mudugud in tslúaig aile amal leomain londchrechtaig eter banbraid corbo díanleges dó amal ro thuitset a gaí chró ass la méit na ferggi ro gab iar marbad a da mac. Maidid for Meidb iar sin &ersir; dofuittet tri coícait léech lánchalma dia
muntir. &ersir; nos berat na ferchutredaig ass hí iar sin. amal bá bés dóib. &ersir; ro len Conchobor in maidm co ndechaid dar Mag nIni immach. Impáis Conchobor iar sin fri dúnud &ndot;Geirg dia indriud. Atagat munter Geirg andside im Chobthach Cnesgel cath cróda comnart do Chonchobur ic cosnam a ndúnaid. Imsaí Conchobor chucu amal fáel
fó chairib. &ersir; feraid comlund fri Cobthach &ersir; dorochair Cobthach deside. &ersir; ro marbad cech óen ba inechta dia muntir. & ataig Conchobor lais ina fúair d'ór &ersir; d'argut &ersir; d'indruini &ersir; do chornaib &ersir; do choppanaib &ersir; d'escraib &ersir; d'arm &ersir; d'étuch. Rofuc dano leis in dabaig umai ro boí is tig. &ersir; no fiurad forba Ulad uili a llán do lind. & is ria atberthea
ól &ndot;guala la Ultu. Fo bíth is teni guail no bíd i nEmain is tig i n-ibthea hí &ersir; is uad ro ainmniged Loch Guala umai i nDaminis criche Ulad ar is foí atá indiu i ndiamraib. Dorat dano leis in rígain .i. Nuagil ingin Ergi. &ersir; a hingin .i. Feirb. &ersir; na tri coicait ingen immalle fria. Atbath fo chétoir Ferb &ersir; a trí coícait ingen immalle
fria do chumaid na macraide. Atbath dano Nuagel do chumaid a fir &ersir; a da mac. Ro claided úag do &Fdot;eirb iar sin. &ersir; ro tócbad a lia. &ersir; ro scríbad ainm oguim. &ersir; doringned duma immon licc. conid Duma Ferbi a ainm ri Ráith Ini aniartúaid atá. Imthigid Conchobor co mbúaid &ersir; choscur co rocht co Emain &ersir;
adfét a scéla o thús co dered do Mugain &ersir; ro ráid fria &fdot;ili .i. Ferchertne mac Dergerdne meic Gairb meic Fir Rosa Ruaid meic Rudraige co ndernad glónathe airchetail co cummair do chumnigud in scéoilsin. Conid iar sin ro chansom in laídseo sís. &ersir; ro &fdot;alsig ind éicsiu dósom combad fúasait don Táin in scelso.

lg.l: co n-aca ní chuci in mnaí
Asbert fris in ben co mblaid
do cech leith úair it irdairc.
Cid as nesu dúin de sin
asníd a bé dún co llí
Cia nos ber nual cen goí
Noco toil sin slicht nad bá
Fil gním n-amra. dét for sét
la ingin Geirg do Glind Geirg;
Im thráth nóna nuall glan gle.
Cia lín ragmait réim cen aír
Asbert fris in ben co mbail
is lór na fil chena trá
is derb cia anam nar tig
Dabach umai i tig ind rig
Aill amae tall ar in druí
di láim ind ríg nad imchloí
coro es Brod úad in sleig
co mboí tria Gerg isin tig
In ben chetna thiar fri Meidb
dia laim féne ferr cech cur
Remscél do Tháin Bó Cual&ndot;ge cain

div1.p:
CId dia mboí lo&ndot;ges mac nUsnig. Ni handsa. Batar Ulaid oc ól i taig &Fdot;eidlimthi meic Daill scelaige Conchobuir. Baí dano ben ind &Fdot;éidlimthe oc airiuc don t⋅lúag osa cind is sí thorrach. Tairmchell corn &ersir; cuibrend &ersir; rolasat gair mesca. A mbátar
do lepthugud dolluid in ben dia lepaid. Oc dul di dar lár in taige ro grécha in lenab ina broind co closs fón less uile. Atraig cach fer di alailiu is tig lasin screich ísin co mbátar cind ar chmd is taig. Is and adragart Sencha mac Ailella. Na curid cor díb or se. Tucthar cucund in ben cu festar cid dia tá a ndeilmsea. Tucad iarum in ben
chucu. Is and asbert a ceile .i. Feidlimid.

lg.l: .R. Cia deilm dremun derdrethar a ben or se
gloim eter do da thaíb trentormaid

div1.p: Is and rolasi co Cathbath ar ba fissidside.

lg.l: Or nad fil lem féin findfocla

div1.p: Is and asbert Cathbad.

Dorat iar suidiu in Cathbath a láim fora broind na mna. Coro derdrestar in lelap fo láim. Fír ar se ingen fil and. &ersir; bid Derdriu a hainm. &ersir; biaid olc impe. Ro genair ind ingen iar sin. & ro ráid
Cathbad.

lg.l: dot dáig a be for lassair;
bid aithrech a coll cid iar tain.
Is tríut a bé co mbail
Is it chin a bé co mbail
biaid do lectan i nnach dú
bid scél n-airdairc a Derdriu. A.

div1.p:
Marbthar ind ingen ar ind óic. Nithó or Conchobor. Berthair limsa ind ingen imbarach or Conchobor. &ersir; ailebthair dom réir fein. & bid sí ben bias im &fdot;arradsa. & nira lamatar Ulaid a chocert immi. Dogníther ón dano. Ro alt la Conchobor combo sí ingen as mórailliu ro boí i nHerind. Is i liss fo leith ro alt connach acced
fer di Ultaib hí cosin n-úair no &fdot;oad la Conchobor. & ní bui duine no leicthe issin leisin acht a haitisi &ersir; a mummi. & dano Lebarcham. ar ní éta gabail disside. ar ba banchainte. Fecht n-and dī baí a haite na ingine oc fennad lofg &fdot;othlai for snectu immaig issin gemrud dia &fdot;uni dissi. co n&fdot;accasi in fiach oc
ól na fola forsin tsnechtu. Is and asbertsi fri Leborchaim. Ropad inmain oen&fdot;er forsa mbetis na tri dath ucut .i. in folt mar in fiach. &ersir; in grúad mar in fuil. &ersir; in corp mar in snechta. Orddan &ersir; tocad duit. ni cían úait atá is taig it arrad .i. Noísi mac Usnig. Nipam slánsa ám or issi conid n-accursaide.
Fecht n-and dī buíseom intí Noísi a óenur for dóe na rrátha .i. na Emna oc andord. Ba bind i&mmacr; a n-andord mac nUsnig. Cech bó &ersir; cech míl rochluined no mbligtis d'immarcraid uadib. Cech duine nod chluined ba leór sithchaire &ersir; airfitiud doib. Ba maith a &ndot;gaisced dano. cia do beth coiced Ulad uile impu i n-oenbaile
acht coro chuired cách díb a triur a druim fri araile. ni bertais buaid díb ar &fdot;ebas na ursclaige &ersir; na imdíten. Bat comluatha dano fri conaib oc taffond. No marbdais na fiada ar lúas. A mbuísium dī a oínur intí Noísi i mmaig mosetl.nsi cuci immach amal bid do thecht secha. & nis n-athgeóin. Is caín or
seiseom in t⋅amai⋅c téit sechond. Dlegtair or sisi samaisci móra
bale na bít tairb. Atá tarb in chóicid lett or seiseom .i. rí Ulad. No thogfaindse etruib far ndís or sisi. & no gebaind tarbín óc amal tussu. Nithó or seiseom. La sodain focheird bedg cuce corra gaib a dá n-ó fora chind. Da n-ó mele &ersir; cuitbiuda and so ol si mani
mberasu latt. Eirgg uaim a ben olse. Rot bia ol sisi. Atraacht la sodain a andord ass. Amal rochualatar Ulaid innund in andord atraig cech fer díb di alailiu. Lotar meic Uisnig immach do thairmesc a mbrathar. Cid no taí ol seat. na 'mmongo&mdot;ad d'Ultaib it chinaid. Is and dochuaid
dóib a ndoronad friss. Biaid olc de ar ind oic. Cia beith noco biaso fó mebail céin bemmitni i mbethaid. Regmaitni lee i tír n-aile. Ni &fdot;il i nHerind ríg na tibre fálte dún. Batar eat a comairle. Ro imthigsetar ind aidchisin .i. trí coícait láech dóib &ersir; lll. ban. &ersir; lll. gilla. & Derdriu leo. Batar for essama céin móir mórthimchell. Co
trialta a ndíth co mmenic ic rígaib Herend tria indle &ersir; chelga Conchobuir. Otá Ess Ruaid timchell síardes co Beind Etair sairtúaid daridisi. Araide tra co ndarafnetar Ulaid tairis i crích nAlban co ngabsat i ndithrub and. Ond úair ro scáich dóib fiadach in tslébe doelsat for cethra fer nAlban do thabairt chucu.
Dochuatarside dia ndilgiund i n-oenló Co ndeochotar dochum ríg &ndot;Alban conadragaib ina munteras. &ersir; coro gabsat amsai aice. & ro ⋅uidigset a tige isind &fdot;aichthi. Im dágin na ingine dorónta na tigi conná hacced nech leo hí ar daig naro marbtais impi. Fecht and dī luid in rectaire matain moch co rralai cor imma
techsom. Co n-accai in lanamain ina cotlud. Dochuaid ar sin coro dúsig in ríg. Ní &fdot;úaramni or se mnai do dmgbalaso cosindiu. Ata i fail Noísen meic Usnig ben di&ndot;gbala ríg iarthair domain. Marbthar fo chetóir Noíse &ersir; foad in ben letso ol in rectaire. Acc or in rí acht airgsiu dia guidi damsa cech laa fo chlith. Dogníther ón. A n-atbered
i&mmacr; in rectaire chaidche friasi; adfédedsi dia celiu in n-aidchisin fo chetóir. Uair naro etad uadi. no erálta for maccaib Uisnig dul i &ndot;gabthib &ersir; i cathaib &ersir; i ndrobelaib ar daig coro mmarbtais. Araide batar sonairteseom im cach n-imguin connar étad ní dóib asna amsibsin.
Ro tinolta fir Alban dia marbad iarna chomairle frieseon. Adfetsi do Noísin. Imthigid ass or si. uair moni digsid ass innocht nobor mairfither imbárach. Lotar ass ind aidchisin co mbatar i n-inis mara. Adfiadar do Ultaib anísin. Is trog a Chonchobuir ar Ulaid meic Uisnig do thuitim i tirib námat trí chin drochmna. Ba ferr a
comaitecht &ersir; a n-imguin. &ersir; tuidecht dóib dochum a tíre oldaas a tuitim la náimtiu. Tecat dī ar Conchobor. &ersir; tiagat commairge friu.

Berair chucu anísin. Is fo chen lend or seat. Regthair. & taet Fergus frind i comairge. &ersir; Dubthach. &ersir; Cormac mac Conchobuir. Tiagaitside co ragbaiset a lláma di muir.
Baí i&mmacr; imchosnam im &Fdot;ergus da churiud do chormannaib a comairle Chonchobuir. Ar isbertatar meic Uisnig nach ístais biad i nhErind acht biad Conchobuir i tossuch. Luid iarum Fiachu mac Fergusa leo. & anaid Fergus &ersir; Dubthach. & dollotar meic Uisnig co mbátar for faidchi na hEmna. Is and dano tanic Eogan mac
Durthacht rí Fernmaige do chorai fri Conchobor. Ar ro boí i n-essíd friss i cíana. Is seside ro herbad do marbad mac Uisnig &ersir; amsaig Conchobuir immi conna tistais cuciseom. Batar meic Uisnig ina sessom for lar na faidchi. & batar na mnaa ina suidib for dou na hEmna. Dolluid dī Eogan ina thur
iarsind &fdot;aidche. Dolluid i&mmacr; mac Fergusa co mbai for lethláim Noísen. Feraid Eogan ⋅ailti friu la béim forgama do gai mór in Noisen. co rraimid a druim triit. Focheird la sodain mac Fergusa co tuc dí láim dar Noísin co tuc foí &ersir; co tarlaic fair anúas. & is amlaid ro bíth Noísiu tria mac Fergusa anuas. Ro marbtha iar sein sethnón na
faidchi. Conna térna ass acht a ndechuid do rind gai &ersir; do gin chlaidib. & rucadsi innund co Conchobor co mbaí fora láim. & ro cumrigthe a lláma iarna cúl. Atchuas do &Fdot;ergus iarum anísin &ersir; do Dubthach &ersir; do Chormac. Tancatarside co ndernsat gníma móra fo chetóir .i. Dubthach do
marbad Mane meic Conchobuir. &ersir; &Fdot;iachna meic &Fdot;eidilmi ingine Conchobuir dond oenargam. & Fergus do marbad Thraigthreoin meic Traiglethain &ersir; a brathar. & sargud Conchobuir impu. & cath do thabairt eturru iar sin isind oenló co torchratar tri chét de Ultaib eturru. & ingenrad Ulad do marbad do Dubthach ria matain.
iarum Emain do loscud do &Fdot;ergus. Iss ed lotar iarum co Ailill &ersir; co Meidb ar rofetatar is sí lanamain ro &fdot;ailsad. & dano nibu chul serci do Ultaib. Tricha cét rop é lín na llo&ndot;gsi. Co cend se mbliadan dec niro an gol na crith leo i nUltaib. acht gol &ersir; crith leo cech oenaidchi.
Bliadain dissi trá i fail Conchobuir. & risin resin niro thib gen &ndot;gairi. &ersir; ni doid a sáith do biud na chotlud. & ní thuargaib a cend da glún. In tan dī dobertís na hairfiti di is and atberedsi.

lg.l: Cid caín lib in laechrad laind
Arddan co ndam no muicc maiss.
Cid milis lib a mmid mass.
ba millsiu cach biud fo mil
Cid binni lib in cach mí
do ro dalius dro&ndot;g tria alt
na síd na suba na sám.
na tech már na cumthach caín. C.

div1.p: In tan dī no bid Conchobor oca halgenugudsi is and atberedsi.

lg.l: is ed am cein no mmair
In rop ailliu lim fo nim
i mbui cét lám ilar mín.
ro rir a einech ar chuirm

div1.p:
Cid as mó miscais lat atchí ar Conchobor. tussu ám or si &ersir; Eogan
mac Durthacht. Biaso dano bliadain i fail Eogain ar Conchobor. dosbert iarum for láim Eogain. Lotar arnabárach do áenuch Murthemni Buísi ar cúl Eogain i carput. Dorar&ndot;gertsi nach &fdot;acfed a da céili for talmain i n-oen&fdot;echt. Maith a Derdriu ar Conchobor.
Súil chaírech eter da rethi gniisiu etrumsa &ersir; Eogan. Ro baí ail chlochi mór ara cind. Dolleici a cend immon cloich co nderna brúrig dia cind co&mdot;bo marb. Lo&ndot;gas mac Usnig in sin. &ersir; Longas Fergusa &ersir; Aided mac nUisnig &ersir; Drerdrend Finit. Á. finit.

div1.head: Incipit Mesca Ulad.
div1.p:
O Doriactatar Meic Miled Espaine Herind. Tanic a &ndot;gáes timchell Tuathi De Danand. Curu leiced Heriu ar raind Amairgin Glúnmáir meic Miled. Uair is samlaid ro baiside ríg&fdot;ili &ersir; rígbrithem. Curu raind Herind dar dó &ersir; co tuc in leth ro boí sís d'Herind do Thuaith De Danand. & in leth aile do maccaib
Miled Espain da chorp&fdot;ini fadéin. Dochuatar Tuath De Danand i cnoccaib &ersir; sidbrugib cura accallset sída fo thalmain dóib. Bar&fdot;acsat cúic&fdot;iur díb ar comair caich cóicid i nHerind ic mórad chath &ersir; chongal &ersir; áig &ersir; urgaile etar maccu
Miled. Baracsat cuiciur díb ar comair cúicid Ulad in t⋅ainruth. Anmand in chuicfirsin. Brea mac Belgain a Drommannaib Breg. Redg Rotbél a slemnaib Maige Ítha. Tinnell mac Boclachtnai a Sléib Edlicon. Grici a Cruachán Aigli. Gulban Glass mac Gráci a Beind Gulbain Guirt meic Ungairb.
Barimmartatar sin inlach eter chúiced Ulad. imma raind i trí in tan is ferr ro buí in cúiced .i. ra lind Conchobuir meic Fachtna Fathaig. Is iat ra roind in coiced ra Conchobor a dalta fadessin .i. Cu Chulaind mac Sualtaim. &ersir; Fintan mac Neill Níamglonnaig a Dún Da Bend. Is é raind tucad ar cúiced a Cnucc Uachtair &Fdot;orcha risa
ráter Uisnech Mide. cu tailmedon Trága Baile. cuit Con Culaind din chuiciud. Trian Conchobuir i&mmacr; á Thráig Bali co Traig Tola i nUltaib Trían Fintain. ó Traig Tola cu Rind Semni &ersir; Latharnai. Bliadain don chuiciud amlaidsin ina trí rannaib. Co ndernad feiss na samna la Conchobor i nEmain Macha. Ba sed mét na fledi. cét
&ndot;dabach do cach lind. Atbertatar áes gráda Conchobuir nar furáil mathi Ulad uile ic tomailt na fledisin ara febas. Is í comairli dori&ndot;gned la Conchobor Lebarcham do &fdot;aidiud ar cend Con Culaind co Dún &ndot;Delga & Findchad Fer Bend Uma mac Fraeglethain d'&fdot;aídiud ar cend Fintain meic Neill Niamglonnaig co
Dún Da Bend. Rosiacht Leborcham co Dún Delga. &ersir; atbert ra Coin Culaind tuidecht d'acallaim a chaemaite. cu hEmain Macha. Is amlaid buí
Cu Chulaind &ersir; com&fdot;led mór ace do lucht a chrichi fadessin. i nDún Delga. & atbert na ragad. acht bith oc frithalim lochta a chríchi
fodesin. Atrubairt Emer Foltchain ingen Forgaill Manach in tsessed ben is ferr tarraill Herind. na di&ndot;gned acht dul d 'acallaim a aite Conchobuir. Atbert Cu Chulaind a eich do gabail dó &ersir; a charpat do indell. Is gabtha na eich &ersir; is innilti in carpat ar Laeg nit in&fdot;uirig cusin
anuair nadat torbad dit gaisciud. Ci&ndot;g and ind uair bas ail duit. Gebaid Cu Chulaind a threlam gaiscid immi. & faleblaing ina charpat. imrulaid remi Cu Chulaind i tremdirgi na sliged. i n-athgardi na conar. cu hEmain Macha. & tánic Sencha mac Ailella d'&fdot;erthain &fdot;áilti ra Coin Culaind ar fagthi na hEmna. Is íseo falti ferastar fris.
Mo chen bithchen do thíchtu a chend sochair slúaig Ulad. a éo gaile &ersir; gaiscid Gaedel. a meic dil drongaich dornchorcra Dechtini. Fálti fir connaig ascid sin bar Cu Chulaind. Is sed écin bar Sencha mac Ailella. Apair ca hascid connaigi ar Cu Chulaind. Atbér acht co rabat glinni mo di&ndot;gbála ria. Apair ciata glinni condaigi dar cend
frithaisceda damsa. Na da Chonall &ersir; Loegaire .i. Conall Ánglonnach mac Iriel Glunmair. &ersir; Conall Cernach mac Amairgin. &ersir; Loegaire Londbuadach. Ra fornaidmed forna coraibsin inn ascid dar cend frithaisceda do Choin Chulaind. Cata cuir condaigisiu rit frithaiscid bar Sencha. Na trí gillai óca ána airegda. Cormac Condlongas
mac Conchobuir. Mes Dead mac Amairgin. Eochu Cendgarb mac Celtchair. Is sed connaigimse ar Sencha mac Ailella. In trian fil it láim do Ultaib do lecud úait ra bliadain do Chonchobur diamba &fdot;erddi in cuiced a bith aci ra bliadain. ní hindsa uair is é in tipra na telluch thechtaide é na fétaither d'áthgud na d'éligud. úa
ríg Herend is Alban. sech dambad &fdot;erddi in coiced a bith ace ra bliadain ní hindsa a bith ace. &ersir; mani ferddi. scolfa minmac lind a chor fora trian fein i cind bliadna. Doriacht Fintan mac Neil Niamglonnaig. Airichlis Cathbath druí degamra. Ra &fdot;írastar failti fris. Mo chen do thichtu a óclaíg
alaind amra a phrimgascedaig ollchuicid Ulad risná gabat dibergaig na hanmargaig na hallmaraig a &fdot;ir ocharimmil chuicid Ulad. Fáilte fir connaig ascid sin ar Fintan. Is ed écin ar Cathbad. Apair conat raib ar Fintan. Atbér acht conam rabat glinni mo di&ndot;gbala ria. Apair cata glinni connaigi. dar cend frithaisceda
damsa ar Fintan. Celtchair mac Uthidir. Uma mac Remanfisig a Fedain Cualngi. Errgi Echbél a Brí Errgi. Ra fornaidmed forna
coraibsin. Apairsiu fadechtsa cata cuir geba frit rithascid a &Fdot;intain. Tri meic Uisnig anglonnaig. tri aenchaindli gascid na hEórpa. Noisi &ersir; Anli &ersir; Ardan. Ra fornaidmit na glinnisin leith for leth.
Táncatar is tech i mbaí Conchobor .i. is Teite &mdot;Brecc. Is rí Ulad Conchobor ifechtsa ar Cathbath. ma thuc Fintan a thrían dó is sed ar Sencha ar tuc Cu Chulaind. Mas sed or Cu Chulaind ticed d'ól &ersir; d'óebinnius limsa ar is í mo rithascid. Cadeat m'acsinesea &ersir; m'urnadmand ar Fintan. in tráth lamair a radsin. Tincsetar
glinni cechtar n-aí díb cu barbarda. &ersir; ba sed barbardacht na comergi co mbaí nónbor i ngonaib &ersir; nonbor i fuilib. &ersir; nonbur ra hulibásaib. eturru for leth. Atrácht Sencha mac Ailella &ersir; barocroth in craíb sídamail Senchada. comba taí tastadach for Ultaib. Romór debthaigthi ar
Sencha. úair ní rí Ulad Conchobor co cend &mdot;bliadna. Dogenamni sin ar Cu Chulaind acht na tísirsiu etraind i cind bliadna. Ni thargsa ón ar Sencha. Fornaidmis Cu Chulaind fair. Damnatar la tri laaib &ersir; aidchib ic ól na coibledisin Conchobuir. co tarnacar leo. Lotar da tigib &ersir; dúnib &ersir; dagárasaib ar sain.
Intí thanic i cind bliadna ro boí in coiced ina thopor thuli &ersir; techta ac Conchobor. conna rabi aithles fás fal.am otá Rind Semni &ersir; Latharnai co Cnocc Uachtair &Fdot;orcha. &ersir; co Duib &ersir; co Drobais. cen mac i n-inad a athar &ersir; a ⋅enathar ic tairgnam da thigernu duthaig.
Is and so dorala caínchomrád eter Coin Culaind &ersir; Emir. Atar lim ar Emer is ardrí Ulad ifectsa Conchobor. Ni liach ciambad ed ar Cu Chulaind. Is mithig a choibled rígi do denam dó badechtsa ar Emer. ar is rí co suthain é Dentar dī bar Cu Chulaind. Dori&ndot;gned in choibled co mboí cét &ndot;dabach do cach lind inti. Is in tan cetna
rachomarléic Fintan mac Neil Niamglonnaig a choibled do denam co mboí cét &ndot;dabach do cach lind inti. & corbo éim &ersir; corbo ellam i n-oenló ra fuaprait &ersir; i n-oenló rapsat irlama. i n-oenló ra gabait a n-eich dóib &ersir; ra hindlit a carpait.
