marbtha. Ro &fdot;ég in t-ara dara aiss. &ersir; iss ed ro ráid is doolochta in marbad marbtair do muntersu ar se. Ní hé a n-aithfer féin téit &fdot;orro ar se. acht aithfer m úabairse &ersir; m anfírinni. & impá dún in carpat na n-aigid ar se. Uair dá marbthar misse ar &fdot;uid bud tessarcon
do ⋅ochaide. Ro impad in carpat iar tain i n-agid na námat. & dorigni in tAilill díanathirgi iar tain. & dorochair lá namtib. Fúair dano in fersain cendsa in Chomded ar Colum Cille. Feradach Find mac Duach i&mmacr; rí Ossairge fer santach díchuibsech atacomnaicside. & cinco cluined acht mad oenscrepul óir vel argit ac duine na thír dobeired ar écin chuica féin. co cuired i cumtaigi 38660 corn &ersir; crandoc &ersir; claideb &ersir; &fdot;idchell. Ro gab iarum treblait dolochta iar tain é Ra tinólit chuice a ⋅éoit co mbátar na thuilg aice féin. Tancatar a námait a íar tain do gabail tige fair. Tancatar im a meic chuciseom do brith na set leo. Ni berthai a maccu ar se. uair ro chraidisa sochaide imna sétaibsin. is tol lim ar Dia mo chrád 38665 féin i fus impu &ersir; a mbreith dom deóin dom námtib uaim ar dáig narom chraidea in Comdiu thall. Ra imthigset a meic úadsom iar tain. & ro gab fein for dianaithrige. &ersir; fúair bás o námtib. &ersir; fogeib cendsa in Chomded.

Messe féin dano ar Aed in fagbaim cendsa in Chomded. Ní faigbusu itir on for Colum Cille. A chlerig dano ar esseom fagaib ón Chomdid dam can mo choscur do brith do Laignib. Is dolig limsa ón bar Colum Cille. uair dib mo mathair. amp tancatar Lagin chucum co Daurmag. & ro &fdot;uaipertar troscud form
co tucaind ascid meic sethar. &ersir; iss ed connaigsetar &fdot;orm cen choscor do brith do ríg echtrand uadib. & ro gellussa doibsium ón. Acht chena ac seo mo chocholl dait &ersir; ni mairbfider thú ass dia mbe immut. Is ésin tra in cocholl ro íarr Áed fora gilla in n-úair út. Iss ed i&mmacr; atbert in gilla ra &fdot;ácsam ar se ac Ailiuch in cochollsin. Atbert dano Áed is dóchaite ar se m'&fdot;ácbailse innocht la Lagnib.
Imthús Branduib sunna. Ro herlamaigit leis a grega &ersir; a damrada. & ro chóraig a chatha. & ra imthig reme ra demi na haidche. Co cualatar Airgialla in sit sait &ersir; broscur in mór⋅lúaig &ersir; rámtéan na grega &ersir; tenmnedach na damraide fana fénaib.
Atraachtatar Airgialla fó n-idnaib. Cia so bar Airgialla. ni handsa. gillanrad Lagen fó biud do ríg Herend. Atrachtatar Airgialla súas &ersir; in lám dobered in fer suas bogebed mart vel muicc fo láim. Fír dóib bar rí Airgiall. Léicid sechaib iat. Imthigem dī bar Airgialla nara dermaitigther don chomraindsin. Luidset Airgialla rempo
da mbothaib longphuirt. Lotar rempo Lagin co cnocc na caindle i mmedón in longphuirt. & gatait in coire din chaindil. Cá solse már atchíam bar in rí Ni handsa. bar in clam. In biad doriacht. Ro érig in clam &ersir; ra ben a choiss craind de. &ersir; rosiacht a lám a
chlaideb. Ro tairntea a n-aireda dona damradaib. &ersir; ro léicthea na graige fo scoraib fer &ndot;Herend co ndechatar i fenscor. coro brissiset botha &ersir; pupli fer &ndot;Herend. Atraachtatar Lagin assa cliabaib amal buinne dílend do aillib i n-imdornaib a claideb. i cúslaigib a scíath. i n-attaib a llúrech.
Cia so bar cenel Conaill &ersir; Eogain Lucht taisbénta in bíd ar in clam. Indeo ale bar cách is sochaide íat. & ro ergiset Conall &ersir; Eogan. & cid iatside ropsat láma i nnet nathrach. Dori&ndot;gned cró sleg &ersir; scíath acco 'má ríg &ndot;Herend. & tucad é bara ech. & rucsat léo co Bernaid na Scíath. Fácbaiter scéith fer &ndot;Herend ra hucht na
bernadsin. Berid Rón Cerr muscul ar ammus rig Herend. &ersir; marbais nonbor 'ca innsaigid. & tánic Dub Dúin rí Airgiall eturru. & comraicis dó &ersir; do Rón Chirr. & tuittis Dub Duin leis. Berid Rón Cerr doridisi muscul ar ammus rig Herend. & tic Fergus mac Flathraí rí Tailcha
Óc eturru & tuttis Fergus la Ron Cerr. Berid Rón Cerr iar sain
muscul ar ammus in ríg. &ersir; gebis a choiss &ersir; trascraiss cuce é da eoch. & benaid a chend de forin licc commaig cnám. Gabais chuice a théig &ersir; dórt a mírenda esti &ersir; curis in cend inti. & gabais reme fo láim for lergaib in t⋅léibe. &ersir; anais and co matin.
Ro lensat dano Lagin iar tain Leth Cuind &ersir; cuirit a ndergár. Luid cách arnabárach co coscor &ersir; co mmaídib connici bail i rrabe Brandub. Tic dano Rón Cerr &ersir; curis cend Aeda meic Ainmerech na &fdot;iadnaisi. Conid Cath Dúin Bolg sin for boroma. Isin cathsa ro marbad Becc mac Cuanach.
Ra thobgiset iar tain in mborama .i. Colmán Rímid. &ersir; Aed Úaridnach. Mael Coba. Subne Mend. Domnall mac Aeda. Cellach &ersir; Conall Cáel da mac Mael Choba. Blaithmac &ersir; Diarmait. Gabais iar tain mac Blaithmaic ríge &ndot;Herend. Acus ni thuc in &mmacr;borama. Cora tinolad leis tuaiscert &ndot;Herend. & atnaig 'ca n-achain
&ersir; ro ráid

Tuc lais Conall &ersir; Éogan is Airgialla Fir Breg &ersir; fir Mide co Lerg mna Fine. Lotar Lagin ina ndail andsin Is é ba rí Lagen in tan
sin. Faelán mac Colmain &ersir; ferais cath. Memais for Sechnasach. & cuirther ár Lethi Cuind. Facthair in boromai ac Lagnib. Gabais Cendfaelad mac Crundmáel .iiii. blíadna. Co torchair la Fínnachta. Gabais Finnachta Fledach mac Dunchada iar sain ríge &ndot;Herend
.xx. &mdot;bliadan. & berid in &mdot;bóroma fo dí cen &fdot;resabra. In tress
fecht tánic da tobuch ra ergitar Lagin na agid. Doronad mórthinól Lethi Cuind laisium co Lathraig Muridaig i cocrích Lagen &ersir; Mide. Rosaig a &fdot;iss sain co Bran mac Conaill. Tinoltair laiside Lagin co mbátar eter laech &ersir; clerech co hAlind.

Ni thánic dano Mo Llmg leo. & tiagair ara chend Mo Lli&ndot;g uadib. &ersir; iss and boí Mo Lling in tansain ac Ross Bruicc risi n-abbar Teg Mo Lling in tanso. Uair o thanic Mo Lling o &Sdot;ruthair Gúaire nocon &fdot;úair inad árais naco toracht co Ross &mdot;Bruicc. Unde Mo Lling. cecinit.

lg.l: Ross Bruic ar brú na Berba.
Teg Mo Lli&ndot;g bías ar m árus;

div1.p: Mar doriacht in fiss sain dochom Mo Lling ra thinoil a muntir &ersir; doringni in laid.

lg.l: Inmain tríar a Christ grind glúair.
ragas lemsa ar cend in búair;

div1.p:
Assa aithle sin gabais Mo Lling reme co hAlind áitt i rrabatar
Lagin. & ro ferad fírchaín fáilte accu fri Mo Lling. & dessid Mo Lling for láim ríg Lagen.

Is in tansin ro ráid Bran Ca comairle dogénam .i. in cath dobéram do Leith Chuind. vel in a mmunigin ar néem chena ragmait d'iarraid a maithme na borama. & mass a munigin náem cía do náemaib Lagen churfimmid d'iarraid maithim na boroma. &ersir; is amlaid ra
boí ca rád &ersir; doringni in laid.

lg.l: No inn é crúas ar catha.
Is é in torc dar trétaib.
is e in barr úas gécaib.
Is é in sról dar slúagaib.
is é in lo&ndot;g ar lúamain.

div1.p: Is andsain atbert Bran Ardchend ac nertad Mo Lling.

lg.l: is érig a Mo Lling. E.

div1.p: Ba érig Mo Lling iar tain &ersir; atbert ra Tollcend Clúa Ena risin filid tuidecht leis co teg ríg combad é no gabad in dúain molta dori&ndot;gni Mo Lling. Is and ro ráid Mo Lling na briathrasa oc tennad a étaig.

lg.l: in tan tic in t-amm. IN.

div1.p:
Gabsat rompo iar tain co teg Cobthaig meic Colmain i nHuib Faelain. & ro diurad fled forro cor batar dóethanaig. Atbertatar a chliar risin fer &ndot;dána. Is bec linne ar siat beith duitsiu i cléir hlerig. Mass ed bar in file fácbam na clercho. &ersir; tiagam rempo co teg ríg Herend. Ro gabsat rempo iarum co teg Fínnachta. Mar
rancatar ro gab in fer dána dúain Mo Lling. &ersir; atbert iss é doringne. Imthúsa Mo Lling. ra érigside arnabárach. & ní fríth in chlíar. Is fir ar Mo Lling. Élúd ram dúainse dormgne in fer dána. &ersir; recfaid hí ra ríg Herend. Rachuaid Mo Lling reme i mMuneal Findmaige risi n-apar Mag
Nechain indiu. i mMag Cláraig súas co ránic co lLathrach Muridaig. Ra éirgiset maccaíme fer &ndot;Herend dóib 'ma Dondgilla mac Finnachta iarna turchlossin dóib reme. Dosbertatar froiss .i. fross do &fdot;ótaib. do chlochaib. &ersir; do cheppaib connach. roibidis da cleirech i n-aeninad dib. Gabais reme Mo Lling araba co ranic tech in rig. & ní
&fdot;úair coimergi and. Dercais forin sluag &ersir; ba nár leis. can comergi d'&fdot;agbáil &ersir; do chonnairc sin Colco mac Maenaig meic Dubanaig meic rig Hua Colgan &ersir; do erich reime. & tócbais Diarmait mac Colcon a glún reime. & iss and bátar for uaitne cerna in cholbai. Ros bennach Mo Lling iartain in Colgainsin &ersir; in Diarmait mac
Colcon. Darala ag allaid iar tain ar ammus na macraide cétna. & ro dibairgset in n-ag n-allaid. co tarla erchor díb i tengaid orcan Dondgillai meic Finnachtai combo marb de fo chetóir. i n-osnaid Mo Lling. Co tucad gáir mór gubai and. Ca guba mor so bar
Finnachta. Do maccsu Donngilla darochair and im einechsa ar Mo Lling. Todíusc in mac a chlerig ar Finnachta &ersir; rot fia a lóg. Ni iarraim ar Mo Lling armo dúain &ersir; ar todíuscud do meic &ersir; ar nem duit féin. acht cairddi 'mán mborrama co lluán. Rot fíasu sin bar in rí
Ro érig Mo Lling cuce &ersir; ro naidm in Trínoit &ersir; in cetharsoscela comdeta fair. & táirthis báeth n-áraig fair. Gabais in clerech a dúain.

lg.l: is í in bárc úasin tuind
is í in tond úas tracht.
Is é in cath ar tír
is é rí Temra ca tíath.
iss é in tríath da tic a lles.
Is é tuile glond ri gail.
is é in tond immaig 's amach;
is é rí na Temrach túaid.
is é int íarn cruaid resin cath.
is é in Finnachta nach fand.
is é in crand fíngarta find.
Téit in crod a seilb cach aín.
báegul cach nech fo nim nár.
dar lem is ferr Fínnachta. F.

div1.p: Messu a chách leind do dál ar in rí bréc do rád duit .i. in dúan doringni Tollcend fili do reicc duit. Atbert Mo Lling. mas é doringne éirged &ersir; geibed a dúain. Ra érig in fili &ersir; dochúaid ina cend &ersir; iss ed ro ráid.
Ergid in fer dána iar sain. &ersir; berid side dían dásachtach co tuind Dúine meic &Fdot;ánat allá túaid d'Ess Rúaid coros báid and.
Mar atchonnairc Finnachta sain Rogab a choiss fón chlerech &ersir; cen a oclugud ris ní bad mó &ersir; a mac do thodiuscud dó &ersir; cech ní 'ma tánic fogebad.

Ra érig Mo Lling iar tain co mbaí ós chind in meic. &ersir; ro guid in
Comdid co díchra coro thodussig Día fairsium mac Finnachta. Is and atbert Mo Lling.

lg.l: bud é in guth gnáth grind.
mo chomge is mo chri. C.

div1.p:
Tanic tra Mo Lling reme atúaid d'insaigid Lagen ar mathim na bórama. Rochuala dano Adomnán in scélsain .i. maithem na boroma do mMo Lling. &ersir; cairdde do thabairt impe co lúan. Tanic reme co dú i rraibe Finnachta. Ro chuir Adomnán clerech da
muintir ar cend Finnachta co tísed da acallaim. Is and ra buí Finnachta oc imbirt &fdot;idchilli. Tair d'acallaim Adomnáin ar in clerech. Ni rag ar Finnachta co táir in cluichiseo. Tanic in clerech co Adamnán. Et ro innis dó in frecrasin. Atbert Adomnán. Imthigsiu arse Adomnán &ersir; abbair frissium. Gebadsa
coícait salm in n-airet. &ersir; atá salm sin choícaitsin getas rígi ara chlaindsium &ersir; ara uib. &ersir; ar fer a chomanma. Tanic in clerech co Finnachta. &ersir; ro innis dó Ni thuc Finnachta da óid sein. co tarnaic in cluchisin d' immirt. Tair d'acallaim Adomnáin ar in clerech. Ni rag ar Finnachta co
táir in cluchiseo. Ro innis in clerech sin do Adomnán. Imthig doridisi ar Adomnán ara ammus. &ersir; apair ris gebatsa coícait aile sunda &ersir; atá salm inti dobéra gairde saeguil dósom. Rochúaid in clerech &ersir; ro innis d'&Fdot;innachta. & ní tharat Finnachta da oid. Co tarnic dó in cluchisin.
Ro ráid in clerech in tres fecht ra Finnachta. Ni rag ar Finnacht co táir in cluichiseo. Tanic in clerech co Adomnan. & ro innis dó Insaigsiu é ar Adomnan. &ersir; abair ris Gebatsa coícait in n-airetsain &ersir; atá salm inti getas fairsium cendsa in Chomded d'&fdot;agbáil. Rochuaid in cle.rech &ersir; ro innis d'&Fdot;innachta.
Mar atchúala Finnachta eside. ro chuir in fidchill co tricc tinnisnech Et tánic reme co dú i rrabi Adomnan. Cid tuca duit ha &Fdot;innactai ár Adomnán. ná tánacais risin céttechtairib. ni handsa. ar Finnachta.

Inra maídis rimsa ar Finnachta .i. cen nech dom chlaind do
gabail ríge &ndot;Herend &ersir; cen &fdot;er mo chomanma. fó al lemsa sain. Aní dano ro gellais dam .i. gairddi saeguil. étrom dano lim sain dáig ra gell Mo Lli&ndot;g nem dam. In tres ní dano ra gellaisiu dam .i. can chendsa in Chomded d'&fdot;agbáil. nira &fdot;ulngiusa sain do chlostecht can tuidecht fót guthsu.

Is dó doringni Día sin. uair inm ra gell Mo Lli&ndot;g dó ar mathim
na bóroma; nira chetaig do Adomnan a imdiupairt imme. In fir mathim na borama duitsiu co día lúain ar Adomnan. Is fír ar in rí Rot melladsu deside bar Adomnan. Uair lúan lathi brátha atbert in clerech. Mani thís taris indiu ní ticfaider co bráth.
Raptar carait i&mmacr; Adomnan &ersir; Finnachta. ora búi Finnachta na rigdomna. &ersir; Adomnan na &fdot;oglaintid óac. Is in tansin doringni Adomnan na runnusa.

lg.l: in dál ro maith do Mo Lling
Cach rí nach maithend a chís.
intí is lac is dó is méla.
mairg rig ro maith in císa
is fata in dálsa ma cate
ní thaeth do rind vel d'&fdot;aebur.
In lo&ndot;g d'ór is án inne

div1.p: Iar sain atraachtatar fir Herend i ndiaid Mo Lling. Et is and boi Mo Lling ac tóraind inaid muilind i Fornocht. Co n-accatar cuccu Fínnachta co feraib Herend. Ó'tchonnaic Mo Lling iat is and atbert

lg.l: mo mallacht is mallacht rig nemda
a ríge sech cach ro therind
ó Uíb Néill can nert doilge

div1.p: Gabais Mo Lli&ndot;g reme darsin n-áth annond. &ersir; benais a chloc. & cuiris scén fo búaib Lagen co riacht cach bó díb a dín &ersir; a da&ndot;gen. Doronsat Leth Cuind cró bodba impu. Is andsin atbert Mo Lling.
Corbar cairrge ar dairge donna. corbar tonna ar glasslinne. corba clocthige os chella nírap ella aissli&ndot;ge.

Ránic reme Mo Lling síar conice dú i tá cross Mo Lling. Ro ⋅uid
and &ersir; doringni in rand.

lg.l: cip é bess for greiss Colaim
ní bía a choland fo chúana.
a Meic Thail ó Chill Chuilind.
is let cech suide suidim. S.

div1.p:
Is iar sain ro ráid Mo Lling ricfaide a less cobair andso i tráthsa. Ro fallsiged do Mo Thairean éside ra boí i n-airiucht ríg Lagen.
Is airc ar se do Mo Lli&ndot;g i trádsa. Et damad maith risin Comdid ropad maith linne ceó do chur thairsiu. Tucad in ceo thairsiu. &ersir; cia thucad ní &fdot;etatarsom a thabairt. Et andar leo atchonncatar a námait. íat. Gabsat rompo co hÁth Loegaire áit i rrucad Labraid Longsech. Bá hand atbert Mo Llin.
Cia fil sin bale ucut i clunem in cloc. Is and atbert Cólmnait in challech fris. Monúar tra a chlerig andar lem is úamain rot medair. Cell Úsaille sin ar in challech. Atbert Mo Lli&ndot;g ca brocc bendchoprach mór sút atchiam i cúil na cetharda. Cell Dara sin ar in challech. Conid and doringni Mo Lling in etarguidi seo.

lg.l: co rísem slán ar tech úait.
cid cian cid garit ar techt
A Brigit bennach rédig mu rót
tair dar cobair cu ba chét
meic uilc ní thiset nar ndáil.
táet co gluc bind arar cend.
ar cach rámut ar bith che
a Chaimgin cháid ma taí it glind
ra báig Mo Lling tócaib cend.
a Choluim cháid o Chlúain Úail
a Chelláin a chell for sléib
tair fo béim in bennáin búain.
Mo Lling na ndáil mas hí chóir.
ra bruinne cach uilc fo thrí
atát i péin mo cho ssa
a Muiri a mathair in Ríg.
a Cholmnat bán is a Bríg. A.

div1.p:
BUÍ dochraiti mór for feraib Herend co forlethan ó Lochlannaib &ersir; o Danaraib dulgib dúrchridechaib fri ré cían &ersir; fri amsir &fdot;ota .i. fri deich &mdot;bliadna &ersir; oct fichit. da cet &mdot;bliadan iar fairind .i. ó Artrí co Brian mac Cennetig. i Cassiul. ó reimes Aeda
meic Néill &Fdot;rossaig. i Temraig .i. se ríg déc risin résain i Cassiul. Da rig déc im i Temraig risin ré cetne. Mór de dod. &ersir; d'imned. de thár &ersir; de tharcassul ra &fdot;ul&ndot;getar fir Herend ri remes na rígsain o Lochlannaib &ersir; o Danaraib.

I rremes Aeda meic Néill ríg Herend. &ersir; Artri meic Cathail rig Cassil. Ra thindscansat Gaill indriud Herend ar tus. a Cammus Hua Fathaid Tire .i. fichi ar chét lo&ndot;g &ersir; ra indretar in tír uili. Ra airged &ersir; ra losced leo Inis Labraind &ersir; Darinis. Tucsat Eoganacht Locha Léin cath dóib &ersir; ro marbad se fir dec ar .cccc. dina Gallaib
in bliadain sin ar marbad Diman Arad &ersir; indara bliadain rigi Fedilmid meic Crimthainn .i. in dechmad bliadain re n-éc Artri. Tanic dano lo&ndot;ges aili ar sain coro innretar Corcaig. &ersir; Inis Temli &ersir; Becherinn &ersir; Cluain Úama. &ersir; Ros Níallain. Et Scelic Míchil Et rucsat Etgal in Scelic leo. i mbrait. conid tre mírbail atrulla úadib. &ersir; ba marb de gortai &ersir; d'íttaid occo hé.

Tanic lo&ndot;ges aili i tuasciurt &ndot;Herend .i. in cethramad bliadain ar n-éc Aeda ríg Herend. Et ra argsetsaide Bendchor Ulad &ersir; ra brissetar scrín Chomgaill. Ra marbsat epscop in bali &ersir; a ecnaidi &ersir; a ⋅ruthi. Ra airgset Mag &mdot;Bili.

Tanic dano longes aili i nHuib Cendselaig. & ra argset Tech Munnu &ersir; Tech Mo Lli&ndot;g. &ersir; Inis Teoc. Tancatar ar sain i nOssairge. &ersir; ra hindred in tír leo. & tucsat Ossairge cath dóib. &ersir; torchratar .clxx. dina Gallaib. Ra airgset &ersir; ra loiscset Less Mór. & Cell Mo Lassi &ersir; Cluain Aird Mo Béccóc Ra toglad leo Dún Dermaigi &ersir; Inis
Eoganáin. Et Disiurt Tipraiti. Ra gab rempo fathuaid iar tain co Snám Aignech. Coro millset Land Leri &ersir; Cell &Sdot;leibi. Atuaid arísi doib coro airgset Sord Coluim Cille &ersir; Dam Liac Cianain. &ersir; Sláni
&ersir; Cell Ausailli. Et Glenn da Locha. &ersir; Cluainn Uama &ersir; Mungarit &ersir; urmór cell Herend uile.

Tanic lo&ndot;ges aile i cuan Lumnig. Et ra hindrit Corco Bascind uathusaide. Et Tratraigi &ersir; Hui Chonaill Gabra. Acht tucsat Hui Chonaill cath dóib la Dondchad rí Hua Conaill in tansa. &ersir; Domnall mac Cindfaelad ri hua Cairpri. &ersir; ni fess ca lín dorochair and.

Tancatar ar sain ríglo&ndot;ges adbulmór la Tuirgéis i tuasciurt
&ndot;Herend. Ra gab in Tuirges rigi Gall Herend. Ra hindred tuascert &ndot;Herend leo. Et ra scailset fo Leth Cuind. Ra gab lo&ndot;ges dib for Loch Echach. Ra gab lo&ndot;ges aile i lLugmud. Lo&ndot;ges aili for Loch Rí. Ra hindred dano Ard Macha fo thrí sinn óenmiss leo. & ro gab Turgeis féin adbaine Aird Macha. Et ra innarb ass Foranann abbaid Aird Macha. co rrócht Mumain' &ersir; scrín Patraic leiss. Et baí
Forannán cethri bliadna i mMumain. Et Turgeis i nArd Macha &ersir; nert tuascirt Herend aice.
Is andsin ra comallad fastini Berchain. in phrim&fdot;adai .i.

lg.l: bid uadib abb for cach cill
Dar ben chloc i Taltin te.
ro gell d'Herind co fa thri

div1.p: .i. Dam i n-inad innarba Coluim Cille dar muir &ersir; dam i n-inad saraigthi Ciarain fein i Taltin. & dam i n-inad troiscthi naem Herend i Temraig ar Diarmait mac Cerbaill.

Tanic iar sain Turges for Loch Rí. & ra indred Midi uad ass &ersir; Connachta. Et ra hindred leiss Cluain mac Nois &ersir; Cluain Ferta
Brenaind. &ersir; Lothra &ersir; Tír da Glas. &ersir; Inis Celtra. &ersir; cella Dergdeirc archena. Tuc Cluain mac Nois da mnaí. Is and rabered a frecartha d'althoir in tempoil móir. Otta ainm mnaa Turgeis. Tucsat Connachta cath dó. i torchair Mael Dúin mac Murgiusa rigdomna Connnacht.

Tancatar iar sain cóic lo&ndot;ga &ersir; tri fichit co Dublind Atha Cliath. & ra hindrit Lagin co Margi leo. & Mag &mdot; Breg. Tucsat Dál Riatai cath don lo&ndot;gissein Uair rachuatar lám chlé ri Herend fathúaid ar milliud Lagen &ersir; Breg. Ra marbad sin chathsin Eoganán mac Oengusa rí Dáil Riatai.

Tanic tóla murbruchta móir do Gallaib i Mumain conna rabi aird inti can lo&ndot;gis. Ra gab lo&ndot;ges díb i Ciarraigi Luachra. & ra hindretar co Cill Íti &ersir; co Cill Eimni. Ra hindretar daex lo&ndot;ges Lumnig Marthin Muman & rucsat Forannan comarba Patraic. ó Chlúin Comarda leo co Lumnech. &ersir; ra brississet scrín Patraic. Is híseo bliadain ra gabad Tuirgeis la Mael Sechnaill. Ro báided ar sain hé i lLoch
Úir .i. bliadain re &mdot;bádud Neill Caille sain. & indara bliadain re n-éc Feidilmid meic Crimthainn. Ar marbad Turgéis dolluid Forannán assin Mumain co hArd Macha. &ersir; ra lessaiged scrín Patraic.

Tancatar dano Gaill co Ross Cré sin bliadainseo. láe feili Poil &ersir; Petuir &ersir; in t-oenach innillti and. &ersir; tucad cath dóib &ersir; ro maid forsna Gallaib tre rath Póil &ersir; Petair &ersir; ro marbad co diarmidi. &ersir; ra bualad Onphile iarla and de chloich coro marb é de. Ba grema d'&fdot;eraib Muman in troscud daronsat ra Pól is ra Petar in n-aidche
reime. Is mór d'ulc &ersir; d'imned fríth uatha &ersir; fuaratarsom ó chách.
do neoch nach scríbthar sund.
Tancatar iar sain lo&ndot;ges adbulmór de Northmannaib for Boind. Ra hindred Brega &ersir; Mide.

Tanic lo&ndot;ges aile corra gaib for Loch nEchach. Ra hindred
leosaide co hArd Macha &ersir; ra locset Ard Macha féin &ersir; ra hairged
Tanic dano lo&ndot;ges aile co Ath Cliath. &ersir; ra hindred leosaide Mag Lagen &ersir; Mag &mdot;Breg. etar thuatha &ersir; cella.

Tanic dano lo&ndot;ges ba liu andásaide co Ath Cliath béus. Ra hindred leosaide urmór Herend uili. Ra hindred leo dano hÍ Coluim Cille. Ra hindred leo Inis Muiridaig &ersir; Daminis. & Glenn da Locha & Lagin
uili co Archad Úr. &ersir; co hAchad &mdot;Bó &ersir; co Liath Mo Chaemóc &ersir; co Daire Mór &ersir; co Cluain Mo Lua. &ersir; co Ross Cré &ersir; co Lothra. coro brissiset scrín Ruadain. & co Cluain mac Nois &ersir; co Saigir. &ersir; co Dirmag.

Tanic lo&ndot;ges o Lumniuch i ndescert &ndot;Herend. &ersir; inriset Scelec Michil &ersir; Inis Fathlind. &ersir; Disiurt Donnain &ersir; Cluain Mór. Coro marbsat Rudgaile mac Trebthaidi. & Cormac mac Selbaig anchora. is desside ra hoslaic a&ndot;gel fo di &ersir; ros ce&ndot;glaitis na Gaill cach n-uairi.

Ra hinnred leo dano Corcaig. & ro losced Ros Ailithri &ersir; Cind Mara. &ersir; Achad &ersir; Árd Feradaig Tugsat dano descert Herend cath
dóib. & darochair Clochna rig Corca ac & Dondchad mac Amalgada ríg Eoganacht ua Neit ac Corcaig ro marbad.

Ra hindred Cill Dara &ersir; Cluain Eidnech &ersir; Cend Ettig. &ersir; Cell Ached la lo&ndot;ges Atha Cliath &ersir; ro toglad Dun Masc. dú inro marbad Aed mac Duib da Crích Fintaind. Rucsat leo i mMumain. &ersir; ra
pianad do iarraid fuaslaicthi fair. &ersir; iss ed nach fuair.
Ra hindred dano Cenannas la lo&ndot;ges Atha Cliath & Manistir Buti & Damliac Cianain &ersir; Sord Coluim Cille. & Findglas Cannig. Ra losced sin uile leo &ersir; ra hindrit.

Tancatar iar sin dubgenti Danarda &ersir; ro laesat fo Herind. & ro
batar oc dichor na findgenti a Herind. & ro marbsat cóic mili dona findgentib oc Snam Aignech. Tanic dano lo&ndot;ges aile cora gaib i Ciarraigi. & ra hinnred leo co Lumnech. Ra hindred leo Cell Ita. &ersir; Imlech Ibair & Cassel na Rig. & Aired Cechtraige. &ersir; Líath Mo Chaemóc. I n-amsir Fedilmid meic Crimthainn darónad na huilcsin.

Ro brissetar forro oc Ess Ruaid. Ra brissetar dano cath forru for Dergdeirc. Ra brissetar dano Dál Caiss cath forru for Dergdeirc. Ra brissetar dano Hú Neill cath aile forro oc Ard Breccain. Ra marbsat dano Hui Cholgan Saxalb iarla. Tuc dano Olchubar mac Cineda rig Cassil á forru. & Lorcan ri Lagen cath
doib ac Sciath Nechtain dú i torchair tanaisi ríg Lochlann &ersir; da cet de maithib Lochlann inti.

Ra thogaib dano in Rigna forro Ra briss dano Mael
Sechnaill ri Temrach cath Caistail Glinne forro du i torchair secht cet. Ra briss dano Tigernach cath forro oc Daire Disirt da Chonna i
torchair da fichet déc.

Ra briss dano Olchobor &ersir; Eoganacht cath forro ac Dun Maeli Tuile dú i torchair cóic cét. Darochratar dano .ccclxuiii. la Hú Fidgenti. Darochratar dano .ccc. la Ciannacht beus i cind mis iar sain oc
Raith Aldain
Ra briss dano Mael Sechnaill cath forro oc Ráith Chomair Ra brissitar Ciarraige Luachra cath forro

Tanic ar sain Amlaib mac ríg Lochlann &ersir; longes gall Herend lanmor leis .i. sin dechmad bliadain re n-éc Mael Sechnaill. cora
gaib rigi gall Herend & is leiss ra baded Conchobor mac Dondchada rigdomna Temrach. Is lesin lo&ndot;gessain ra memaid cath Cluana Daim forsna Desib. dú i torchair mathi na nDési uili. Is leo ra marbad mac Cind&fdot;aelad ri Muscraigi Bregoin. Et ra muchad Muchthigern mac Rechtabrad i n-uaim. Is leo ro marbad Mael Guala mac Dondgaile ri Casil .i. a druim do brissed im chloich. Torcratar tra torcratar na sochaidesin ra firu Herend. &ersir; na toisigseo .i. Scolph &ersir; Ona &ersir; Tomrair &ersir; Turgeis. &ersir;c.

Tanic iar sain Oisli mac rig Lochlann .i. longes lanmor aile &ersir; ra millesetsaide urmor Herend. Darochratar sain dano la feraib Herend. Darochair em Oisli &ersir; ui cetless la feraib i Mumain Iss isein bliadain i torchair Colphin &ersir; lo&ndot;ges Duni Medoin ac Cind Currig. ro bas ica marbad ac Cind Curraig.

O Cind Curraig co Less Mor &ersir; dorochadar im Rechtabrat
mac mBrain. Rachúaid dano Baethbarr iarla &ersir; sochaide de lucht in madma leis oc Ath Cliath iar sin. & ro baded ic Ath Cliath tre mirbuili Ciaran &ersir; Aeda Scannail forsara batar i forbaisi.

Iss isin bliadain i torchair Tomrair iarla la Brenain Cluana Ferta. i cind tri la ar n-argain Cluana Ferta do Ra briss dano Aed
Findliath mac Neill cath forro du i torchair da &fdot;ichet &ersir; ruc Aed a n-uili indmas &ersir; mathius.

Ra hindred dano Lagin &ersir; fir Muman la lo&ndot;ges meic Amlaib iar tain co rrochtatar Ciarraig conna fargsat uaim can telud. & ni &fdot;arcsat ni o Lumneich co Corcaig can indriud. &ersir; ra locset Imlec hIbair. & ra
indredset na Desi descirt de muir. Ra indretar in lucht cetna Midi &ersir; Connacht co rancatar Corca mRuad &ersir; Leim Con Culaind. Darochratar sain uile beos la feraib Herend. Ra cuired a n-ár dano oc Ath Cliath la Aed Findliath mac Neill acin &fdot;leid dari&ndot;gned la Aed da mac Ragnaill. i nAth Cliath. Ra chuirset féin dano cath
eturru .i. Findgenti &ersir; Dubgenti .i. Barith &ersir; mac Ragnaill. dú i torchair mac Ragnaill &ersir; sochaide imme. Ra gonad Barith and &ersir; ba baccach riam iar sain hé.

Ra hindarbait dano Dubgenti a Herind ar sain. & dochuatar i n-Albain. & ro brississet cath for feraib Alban. du i torchair
Constantin mac Cinaeda ardri Alban &ersir; sochaide mor malle riss. Is andsain ra maid in talam fo &fdot;eraib Alban.

Bui im araile cumsanad d'&fdot;eraib Herend fri .xvel. &mdot;bliadan can indred Gall .i. o ré Mael Sechnaill mac Mael Ruanaid cosin &mdot;bliadan re n-ec Flaind meic Mael Sechnaill & co gabail rigi do Niall Glundub
Isin andsain ra maid in talam for &fdot;eraib Alban.

Tanic tra and longes lá Acond &ersir; la Cossa Nára co rragbaiset for Loch da Chaech co hindred Muma leo. Ra brissetar dano Ciarraige cath forro. dú i torchair Tomas Cin Grete. Ra brissetar dano Hu Fathaid &ersir; Hú Oengusa cath aili forro. Ra brissitar dano Ciarraige &ersir;
Eoganacht &ersir; Corco Duibni cath forro oc Lemain. du i torchair Roalt Putrall &ersir; .ccc. immi. &ersir; Smurull.

Tanic iar sain lo&ndot;gess adbulmór clainne Ímair i nAth Cliath. Et ra hindred aurmór Herend leo. Ra milled ém leo Ard Macha Et ra brissetar cath for Fland mac Mael Sechnaill. dú i torchratar
Aed mac Conchobuir Et Lergus mac Crundmael epscop Cilli Dara. Et Dondchad Máel abb Delgga. in bliadain rapo marb Mael Sechnaill sain. Ra hairged dano &ersir; ra losced Less Mór sin bliadain chétna.

Ra harged Cluain Uama. Et ra marbad Fergal mac Finnachta epscop &ersir; abb Cluana Úama. &ersir; Uanan Cerín in secnabb. Sin
bliadainsin ro marbad Donnchad mac Duib da Bairend ri Cassil. Et Siugraid mac Imair ri Gall. Mór trá d'ulc daronsat Gaill i nHerind sin bliadainsin.

Tanic morchoblach la Ragnall mac Imair. &ersir; la hOttir iarla. co rraigbaiset for Loch da Chaech. Ra marbad leo Domnall mac
Dunchada rigdomna Casil. Et ra raindset &ersir; ra hindriset Hu Chairpri &ersir; Muscraigi eturru.

Ra scailset iar sain .i. a trian i Corcaig. Et a trian i nInis na hEidnigi. Et a trian for Glaslind. Ra hindred in Mumain lasin longes⋅in cona raba tene o Luí fodess. Is lasin lo&ndot;gissin ra marbad
Gebennach mac Aeda ri Hua Conaill Gabra &ersir; rucsat a chend leo. Unde

lg.l: Mór scel a De do nim

div1.p: Is leosom ro marbad Anle mac Cathain ri Uaithni Fidbaig amp Lo&ndot;gsech mac Setna
Rachuatar i nAlbain iar tain. Et tucsat fir Alban cath dóib. &ersir; ra marbad and .i. Ragnall &ersir; Oittir
